choices.B: Configure a gateway endpoint for traffic destined to Amazon S3.->为目的地为Amazon S3的流量配置网关终端节点.
choices.C: Configure an interface endpoint for traffic destined to Amazon S3.->为目的地为Amazon S3的流量配置接口终端节点.

body: A company has an ecommerce application that stores data in an on-premises SQL database. The company has decided to migrate this database to AWS. However, as part of the migration, the company wants to find a way to attain sub-millisecond responses to common read requests. A solutions architect knows that the increase in speed is paramount and that a small percentage of stale data returned in the database reads is acceptable. What should the solutions architect recommend? 公司有一个电子商务应用程序，该应用程序将数据存储在本地SQL数据库中.该公司已决定将此数据库迁移到AWS.但是，作为迁移的一部分，该公司希望找到一种方法来实现对常见读取请求的亚毫秒级响应.解决方案架构师知道速度的提高是至关重要的，并且数据库读取中返回的过时数据的一小部分也是可以接受的.解决方案架构师应该建议什么？

choices.A: Build Amazon RDS read replicas.->构建Amazon RDS只读副本.
choices.B: Build the database as a larger instance type.->将数据库构建为更大的实例类型.
choices.C: Build a database cache using Amazon ElastiCache.->使用Amazon ElastiCache构建数据库缓存.
choices.D: Build a database cache using Amazon Elasticsearch Service (Amazon ES).->使用Amazon Elasticsearch Service（Amazon ES）构建数据库缓存.

ans_desc:
https://aws.amazon.com/redis/


To attain sub-millisecond responses to common read requests.REDIS (REmote DIctionary Server) delivers sub-millisecond response times enabling millions of requests per second for real-time applications.为了获得对常见读取请求的亚毫秒级响应。REDIS（远程字典服务器）提供了亚毫秒级响应时间，每秒可为实时应用程序提供数百万个请求。

body: A company has an application that ingests incoming messages. These messages are then quickly consumed by dozens of other applications and microservices. The number of messages varies drastically and sometimes spikes as high as 100,000 each second. The company wants to decouple the solution and increase scalability. Which solution meets these requirements? 公司的应用程序可以接收传入的消息.然后，这些消息会被许多其他应用程序和微服务快速消耗.消息数量变化很大，有时峰值每秒高达100,000.该公司希望解耦该解决方案并提高可扩展性.哪种解决方案满足这些要求？

choices.A: Persist the messages to Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics. All the applications will read and process the messages.->将消息保留到Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics.所有应用程序都将读取并处理消息.
choices.B: Deploy the application on Amazon EC2 instances in an Auto Scaling group, which scales the number of EC2 instances based on CPU metrics.->在Auto Scaling组中的Amazon EC2实例上部署应用程序，该组根据CPU指标扩展EC2实例的数量.
choices.C: Write the messages to Amazon Kinesis Data Streams with a single shard. All applications will read from the stream and process the messages.->使用单个分片将消息写入Amazon Kinesis数据流.所有应用程序将从流中读取并处理消息.
choices.D: Publish the messages to an Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic with one or more Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) subscriptions. All applications then process the messages from the queues.->使用一个或多个Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）订阅将消息发布到Amazon Simple Notification Service（Amazon SNS）主题.然后，所有应用程序都会处理队列中的消息.

ans_desc: SQS:Unlimited Throughput:Standard queues support a nearly unlimited number of transactions per second (TPS) per API action.

body: A solutions architect is designing the cloud architecture for a company that needs to host hundreds of machine learning models for its users. During startup, the models need to load up to 10 GB of data from Amazon S3 into memory, but they do not need disk access. Most of the models are used sporadically, but the users expect all of them to be highly available and accessible with low latency. Which solution meets the requirements and is MOST cost-effective? 解决方案架构师正在为一家需要为其用户托管数百种机器学习模型的公司设计云架构.在启动期间，这些模型需要从Amazon S3最多将10 GB的数据加载到内存中，但是它们不需要磁盘访问.大多数模型都是偶尔使用的，但是用户希望它们都具有高可用性，并且可以以低延迟进行访问.哪种解决方案符合要求，并且最具成本效益？

choices.A: Deploy models as AWS Lambda functions behind an Amazon API Gateway for each model.->在每个模型的Amazon API Gateway后面将模型部署为AWS Lambda起作用.
choices.B: Deploy models as Amazon Elastic Container Service (Amazon ECS) services behind an Application Load Balancer for each model.->为每个模型在应用程序负载均衡器后面将模型部署为Amazon Elastic Container Service（Amazon ECS）服务.
choices.C: Deploy models as AWS Lambda functions behind a single Amazon API Gateway with path-based routing where one path corresponds to each model.->将模型部署为AWS Lambda在具有基于路径的路由的单个Amazon API网关后面运行，其中一个路径对应于每个模型.
choices.D: Deploy models as Amazon Elastic Container Service (Amazon ECS) services behind a single Application Load Balancer with path-based routing where one path corresponds to each model.->将模型作为Amazon Elastic Container Service（Amazon ECS）服务部署在具有基于路径的路由的单个Application Load Balancer后面，其中一个路径对应于每个模型.

body: A company has created a multi-tier application for its ecommerce website. The website uses an Application Load Balancer that resides in the public subnets, a web tier in the public subnets, and a MySQL cluster hosted on Amazon EC2 instances in the private subnets. The MySQL database needs to retrieve product catalog and pricing information that is hosted on the internet by a third-party provider. A solutions architect must devices a strategy that maximizes security without increasing operational overhead. What should the solutions architect do to meet these requirements? 一家公司为其电子商务网站创建了多层应用程序.该网站使用驻留在公共子网中的应用程序负载平衡器，公共子网中的Web层以及在私有子网中的Amazon EC2实例上托管的MySQL群集. MySQL数据库需要检索由第三方提供商托管在Internet上的产品目录和价格信息.解决方案架构师必须制定一种在不增加运营开销的情况下最大化安全性的策略.解决方案架构师应如何满足这些要求？

choices.A: Deploy a NAT instance in the VPC. Route all the internet-based traffic through the NAT instance.->在VPC中部署一个NAT实例，通过NAT实例路由所有基于Internet的流量.
choices.B: Deploy a NAT gateway in the public subnets. Modify the private subnet route table to direct all internet-bound traffic to the NAT gateway.->在公共子网中部署NAT网关.修改私有子网路由表，将所有与Internet绑定的流量定向到NAT网关.
choices.C: Configure an internet gateway and attach it to the VPC. Modify the private subnet route table to direct internet-bound traffic to the internet gateway.->配置一个Internet网关并将其附加到VPC.修改专用子网路由表，将与Internet绑定的流量定向到Internet网关.
choices.D: Configure a virtual private gateway and attach it to the VPC. Modify the private subnet route table to direct internet-bound traffic to the virtual private gateway.->配置一个虚拟专用网关并将其附加到VPC.修改专用子网路由表，以将Internet绑定流量定向到虚拟专用网关.

ans_desc: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/vpc-nat-gateway.html

body: A company is backing up on-premises databases to local file server shares using the SMB protocol. The company requires immediate access to 1 week of backup files to meet recovery objectives. Recovery after a week is less likely to occur, and the company can tolerate a delay in accessing those older backup files. What should a solutions architect do to meet these requirements with the LEAST operational effort? 一家公司正在使用SMB协议将本地数据库备份到本地文件服务器共享.该公司要求立即访问1周的备份文件，以达到恢复目标.一个星期后恢复的可能性较小，该公司可以容忍访问这些较早的备份文件的延迟.解决方案架构师应如何通过最少的努力满足这些要求？

choices.A: Deploy Amazon FSx for Windows File Server to create a file system with exposed file shares with sufficient storage to hold all the desired backups.->部署适用于Windows的Amazon FSx File Server创建具有公开文件共享的文件系统，该文件共享具有足够的存储空间来容纳所有所需的备份.
choices.B: Deploy an AWS Storage Gateway file gateway with sufficient storage to hold 1 week of backups. Point the backups to SMB shares from the file gateway.->部署具有足够存储量的AWS Storage Gateway文件网关，以保存1周的备份.将备份从文件网关指向SMB共享.
choices.C: Deploy Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) to create a file system with exposed NFS shares with sufficient storage to hold all the desired backups.->部署Amazon Elastic File System（Amazon EFS）以创建具有公开NFS共享的文件系统，该NFS共享具有足够的存储空间来容纳所有所需的备份.
choices.D: Continue to back up to the existing file shares. Deploy AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS) and define a copy task to copy backup files older than 1 week to Amazon S3, and delete the backup files from the local file store.->继续备份到现有的文件共享.部署AWS数据库迁移服务（AWS DMS）并定义复制任务，以将超过1周的备份文件复制到Amazon S3，并从本地文件存储中删除备份文件.

ans_desc: Only File Gateway can satisfy the requirement of "immediate access."只有File Gateway才能满足“立即访问”的要求。

body: A company has developed a microservices application. It uses a client-facing API with Amazon API Gateway and multiple internal services hosted on Amazon EC2 instances to process user requests. The API is designed to support unpredictable surges in traffic, but internal services may become overwhelmed and unresponsive for a period of time during surges. A solutions architect needs to design a more reliable solution that reduces errors when internal services become unresponsive or unavailable. Which solution meets these requirements? 一家公司开发了微服务应用程序.它使用具有Amazon API Gateway的面向客户端的API和Amazon EC2实例上托管的多个内部服务来处理用户请求.该API旨在支持不可预测的流量激增，但在激增期间的一段时间内，内部服务可能会变得不堪重负且无响应.解决方案架构师需要设计一个更可靠的解决方案，以减少内部服务无响应或不可用时的错误.哪种解决方案满足这些要求？

choices.A: Use AWS Auto Scaling to scale up internal services when there is a surge in traffic.->当流量激增时，请使用AWS Auto Scaling扩展内部服务.
choices.B: Use different Availability Zones to host internal services. Send a notification to a system administrator when an internal service becomes unresponsive.->使用不同的可用区托管内部服务.内部服务无响应时，向系统管理员发送通知.
choices.C: Use an Elastic Load Balancer to distribute the traffic between internal services. Configure Amazon CloudWatch metrics to monitor traffic to internal services.->使用Elastic Load Balancer在内部服务之间分配流量.配置Amazon CloudWatch指标以监控内部服务的流量.
choices.D: Use Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) to store user requests as they arrive. Change the internal services to retrieve the requests from the queue for processing.->使用Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）来存储用户到达的请求.更改内部服务以从队列中检索请求以进行处理.

body: A company is hosting 60 TB of production-level data in an Amazon S3 bucket. A solution architect needs to bring that data on premises for quarterly audit requirements. This export of data must be encrypted while in transit. The company has low network bandwidth in place between AWS and its on-premises data center. What should the solutions architect do to meet these requirements? 一家公司正在Amazon S3存储桶中托管60 TB的生产级数据.解决方案架构师需要将这些数据带到内部，以满足季度审核的要求.在传输过程中，必须对导出的数据进行加密.该公司在AWS与本地数据中心之间的网络带宽较低.解决方案架构师应怎么做才能满足这些要求？

choices.A: Deploy AWS Migration Hub with 90-day replication windows for data transfer.->部署带有90天复制窗口的AWS Migration Hub，以进行数据传输.
choices.B: Deploy an AWS Storage Gateway volume gateway on AWS. Enable a 90-day replication window to transfer the data.->在AWS上部署一个AWS Storage Gateway卷网关.启用90天的复制窗口以传输数据.
choices.C: Deploy Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS), with lifecycle policies enabled, on AWS. Use it to transfer the data.->在AWS上部署启用了生命周期策略的Amazon Elastic File System（Amazon EFS）.用它来传输数据.
choices.D: Deploy an AWS Snowball device in the on-premises data center after completing an export job request in the AWS Snowball console.->在AWS Snowball控制台中完成导出作业请求后，在本地数据中心中部署AWS Snowball设备.

body: A company uses Amazon S3 to store its confidential audit documents. The S3 bucket uses bucket policies to restrict access to audit team IAM user credentials according to the principle of least privilege. Company managers are worried about accidental deletion of documents in the S3 bucket and want a more secure solution. What should a solutions architect do to secure the audit documents? 一家公司使用Amazon S3来存储其机密审核文件. S3存储桶根据最小特权原则使用存储桶策略来限制对审核组IAM用户凭据的访问.公司经理担心意外删除S3存储桶中的文档，并希望有一个更安全的解决方案.解决方案架构师应采取什么措施来保护审核文档？

choices.A: Enable the versioning and MFA Delete features on the S3 bucket.->在S3存储桶上启用版本控制和MFA删除功能.
choices.B: Enable multi-factor authentication (MFA) on the IAM user credentials for each audit team IAM user account.->在IAM用户凭据上为每个审核组IAM用户帐户启用多因素身份验证（MFA）.
choices.C: Add an S3 Lifecycle policy to the audit team's IAM user accounts to deny the s3:DeleteObject action during audit dates.->将S3生命周期策略添加到审核小组的IAM用户帐户，以在审核日期期间拒绝s3:DeleteObject操作.
choices.D: Use AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) to encrypt the S3 bucket and restrict audit team IAN user accounts from accessing the KMS key.->使用AWS Key Management Service（AWS KMS）加密S3存储桶，并限制审核团队IAN用户帐户访问KMS密钥.

ans_desc: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/security-best-practices.html  https://docs.aws.Amazon.com/Amazon S3/latest/dev/security-best-practices.html

body: A solutions architect is designing a new API using Amazon API Gateway that will receive requests from users. The volume of requests is highly variable; several hours can pass without receiving a single request. The data processing will take place asynchronously, but should be completed within a few seconds after a request is made. Which compute service should the solutions architect have the API invoke to deliver the requirements at the lowest cost? 解决方案架构师正在使用Amazon API Gateway设计新的API，该API将接收来自用户的请求.请求数量变化很大；可能需要几个小时才能收到一个单独的请求.数据处理将异步进行，但应在发出请求后的几秒钟内完成.解决方案架构师应使用哪种API调用API以最低的成本交付需求？

choices.A: An AWS Glue job->AWS Glue作业
choices.B: An AWS Lambda function->AWS Lambda函数
choices.C: A containerized service hosted in Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS)->托管在Amazon Elastic Kubernetes服务（Amazon EKS）中的容器化服务
choices.D: A containerized service hosted in Amazon ECS with Amazon EC2->使用Amazon EC2托管在Amazon ECS中的容器化服务

body: A company hosts its application in the AWS Cloud. The application runs on Amazon EC2 instances behind an Elastic Load Balancer in an Auto Scaling group and with an Amazon DynamoDB table. The company wants to ensure the application can be made available in another AWS Region with minimal downtime. What should a solutions architect do to meet these requirements with the LEAST amount of downtime? 一家公司在AWS云中托管其应用程序.该应用程序在Auto Scaling组中的Elastic Load Balancer后面的Amazon EC2实例上运行，并带有Amazon DynamoDB表.该公司希望确保可以在最少的停机时间内使该应用程序在另一个AWS区域中可用.解决方案架构师应采取什么措施以最少的停机时间来满足这些要求？

choices.A: Create an Auto Scaling group and a load balancer in the disaster recovery Region. Configure the DynamoDB table as a global table. Configure DNS failover to point to the new disaster recovery Region's load balancer.->在灾难恢复区域中创建一个Auto Scaling组和一个负载均衡器.将DynamoDB表配置为全局表.配置DNS故障转移以指向新的灾难恢复区域的负载平衡器.
choices.B: Create an AWS CloudFormation template to create EC2 instances, load balancers, and DynamoDB tables to be executed when needed. Configure DNS failover to point to the new disaster recovery Region's load balancer.->创建一个AWS CloudFormation模板以创建EC2实例，负载均衡器和DynamoDB表，以在需要时执行.配置DNS故障转移以指向新的灾难恢复区域的负载平衡器.
choices.C: Create an AWS CloudFormation template to create EC2 instances and a load balancer to be executed when needed. Configure the DynamoDB table as a global table. Configure DNS failover to point to the new disaster recovery Region's load balancer.->创建一个AWS CloudFormation模板以创建EC2实例，并在需要时执行负载均衡器.将DynamoDB表配置为全局表.配置DNS故障转移以指向新的灾难恢复区域的负载平衡器.
choices.D: Create an Auto Scaling group and load balancer in the disaster recovery Region. Configure the DynamoDB table as a global table. Create an Amazon CloudWatch alarm to trigger and AWS Lambda function that updates Amazon Route 53 pointing to the disaster recovery load balancer.->在灾难恢复区域中创建一个Auto Scaling组和负载均衡器.将DynamoDB表配置为全局表.创建要触发的Amazon CloudWatch警报和AWS Lambda函数，以更新指向灾难恢复负载均衡器的Amazon Route 53.

body: A solutions architect is designing a solution that requires frequent updates to a website that is hosted on Amazon S3 with versioning enabled. For compliance reasons, the older versions of the objects will not be accessed frequently and will need to be deleted after 2 years. What should the solutions architect recommend to meet these requirements at the LOWEST cost? 解决方案架构师正在设计一个解决方案，该解决方案需要对Amazon S3上启用了版本控制的网站进行频繁更新.出于合规性原因，较旧版本的对象将不会经常访问，并且需要在2年后删除.解决方案架构师应建议哪些以最低的成本满足这些要求？

choices.A: Use S3 batch operations to replace object tags. Expire the objects based on the modified tags.->使用S3批处理操作替换对象标签.基于修改后的标签使对象过期.
choices.B: Configure an S3 Lifecycle policy to transition older versions of objects to S3 Glacier. Expire the objects after 2 years.->配置一个S3生命周期策略以将旧版本的对象过渡到S3 Glacier. 2年后使物体过期.
choices.C: Enable S3 Event Notifications on the bucket that sends older objects to the Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue for further processing.->在将较旧的对象发送到Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）队列以进行进一步处理的存储桶上启用S3事件通知.
choices.D: Replicate older object versions to a new bucket. Use an S3 Lifecycle policy to expire the objects in the new bucket after 2 years.->将较旧的对象版本复制到新的存储桶中. 2年后，请使用S3生命周期策略使新存储桶中的对象过期.

body: A company is building an application on Amazon EC2 instances that generates temporary transactional data. The application requires access to data storage that can provide configurable and consistent IOPS. What should a solutions architect recommend? 一家公司正在Amazon EC2实例上构建一个应用程序，该应用程序会生成临时事务数据.该应用程序需要访问可提供可配置且一致的IOPS的数据存储.解决方案架构师应该建议什么？

choices.A: Provision an EC2 instance with a Throughput Optimized HDD (st1) root volume and a Cold HDD (sc1) data volume.->为EC2实例提供吞吐量优化的HDD（st1）根卷和冷HDD（sc1）数据卷.
choices.B: Provision an EC2 instance with a Throughput Optimized HDD (st1) volume that will serve as the root and data volume.->为EC2实例提供吞吐量优化的HDD（st1）卷，该卷将用作根卷和数据卷.
choices.C: Provision an EC2 instance with a General Purpose SSD (gp2) root volume and Provisioned IOPS SSD (io1) data volume.->为EC2实例配置通用SSD（gp2）根卷和IOPS SSD（io1）数据卷.
choices.D: Provision an EC2 instance with a General Purpose SSD (gp2) root volume. Configure the application to store its data in an Amazon S3 bucket.->为EC2实例配备通用SSD（gp2）根卷.配置应用程序以将其数据存储在Amazon S3存储桶中.

ans_desc: Only gp3, io1, or io2 Volumes have configurable IOPS.

body: A company wants to move a multi-tiered application from on premises to the AWS Cloud to improve the application's performance. The application consists of application tiers that communicate with each other by way of RESTful services. Transactions are dropped when one tier becomes overloaded. A solutions architect must design a solution that resolves these issues and modernizes the application. Which solution meets these requirements and is the MOST operationally efficient? 一家公司希望将多层应用程序从本地迁移到AWS云，以提高应用程序的性能.该应用程序由通过RESTful服务相互通信的应用程序层组成.当一层变得超载时，事务将被丢弃.解决方案架构师必须设计解决方案，以解决这些问题并使应用程序现代化.哪种解决方案符合这些要求，并且MOST的运营效率高？

choices.A: Use Amazon API Gateway and direct transactions to the AWS Lambda functions as the application layer. Use Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) as the communication layer between application services.->使用Amazon API Gateway并将事务直接定向到AWS Lambda作为应用程序层.使用Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）作为应用程序服务之间的通信层.
choices.B: Use Amazon CloudWatch metrics to analyze the application performance history to determine the server's peak utilization during the performance failures. Increase the size of the application server's Amazon EC2 instances to meet the peak requirements.->使用Amazon CloudWatch指标分析应用程序性能历史记录，以确定性能故障期间服务器的峰值利用率.增加应用程序服务器的Amazon EC2实例的大小，以满足最高要求.
choices.C: Use Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) to handle the messaging between application servers running on Amazon EC2 in an Auto Scaling group. Use Amazon CloudWatch to monitor the SNS queue length and scale up and down as required.->使用Amazon Simple Notification Service（Amazon SNS）处理Auto Scaling组中在Amazon EC2上运行的应用程序服务器之间的消息传递.使用Amazon CloudWatch监控SNS队列长度，并根据需要进行扩展和缩小.
choices.D: Use Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) to handle the messaging between application servers running on Amazon EC2 in an Auto Scaling group. Use Amazon CloudWatch to monitor the SQS queue length and scale up when communication failures are detected.->使用Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）处理Auto Scaling组中在Amazon EC2上运行的应用程序服务器之间的消息传递.当检测到通信故障时，请使用Amazon CloudWatch监视SQS队列长度并进行扩展.

body: A company hosts historical weather records in Amazon S3. The records are downloaded from the company's website by a way of a URL that resolves to a domain name. Users all over the world access this content through subscriptions. A third-party provider hosts the company's root domain name, but the company recently migrated some of its services to Amazon Route 53. The company wants to consolidate contracts, reduce latency for users, and reduce costs related to serving the application to subscribers. Which solution meets these requirements? 一家公司在Amazon S3中托管历史天气记录.记录是通过可解析为域名的URL从公司网站下载的.全世界的用户都通过订阅来访问此内容.第三方提供商托管了公司的根域名，但是该公司最近将其某些服务迁移到了Amazon Route53.该公司希望巩固合同，减少用户的等待时间，并减少与向订户提供应用程序相关的成本.解决方案满足这些要求？

choices.A: Create a web distribution on Amazon CloudFront to serve the S3 content for the application. Create a CNAME record in a Route 53 hosted zone that points to the CloudFront distribution, resolving to the application's URL domain name.->在Amazon CloudFront上创建一个Web分发以为应用程序提供S3内容.在Route 53托管区域中创建一个CNAME记录，该区域指向CloudFront分发，从而解析为应用程序的URL域名.
choices.B: Create a web distribution on Amazon CloudFront to serve the S3 content for the application. Create an ALIAS record in the Amazon Route 53 hosted zone that points to the CloudFront distribution, resolving to the application's URL domain name.->在Amazon CloudFront上创建一个Web分发以为应用程序提供S3内容.在Amazon Route 53托管区域中创建一个指向CloudFront分发的ALIAS记录，解析为应用程序的URL域名.
choices.C: Create an A record in a Route 53 hosted zone for the application. Create a Route 53 traffic policy for the web application, and configure a geolocation rule. Configure health checks to check the health of the endpoint and route DNS queries to other endpoints if an endpoint is unhealthy.->在应用程序的Route 53托管区域中创建A记录.为Web应用程序创建Route 53流量策略，并配置地理位置规则.配置运行状况检查以检查端点的运行状况，如果端点不正常，则将DNS查询路由到其他端点.
choices.D: Create an A record in a Route 53 hosted zone for the application. Create a Route 53 traffic policy for the web application, and configure a geoproximity rule. Configure health checks to check the health of the endpoint and route DNS queries to other endpoints if an endpoint is unhealthy.->在Route 53托管区域中为该应用程序创建A记录.为Web应用程序创建Route 53流量策略，并配置geoproximity规则.配置运行状况检查以检查端点的运行状况，如果端点不正常，则将DNS查询路由到其他端点.

body: A company owns an asynchronous API that is used to ingest user requests and, based on the request type, dispatch requests to the appropriate microservice for processing. The company is using Amazon API Gateway to deploy the API front end, and an AWS Lambda function that invokes Amazon DynamoDB to store user requests before dispatching them to the processing microservices. The company provisioned as much DynamoDB throughput as its budget allows, but the company is still experiencing availability issues and is losing user requests. What should a solutions architect do to address this issue without impacting existing users? 公司拥有一个异步API，该API用于提取用户请求，并根据请求类型将请求分派到适当的微服务进行处理.该公司正在使用Amazon API Gateway部署API前端，并使用AWS Lambda函数调用Amazon DynamoDB以在将用户请求分配给处理微服务之前存储用户请求.该公司在预算允许的范围内提供了尽可能多的DynamoDB吞吐量，但该公司仍然遇到可用性问题，并且丢失了用户请求.解决方案架构师应如何解决该问题，同时又不影响现有用户？

choices.A: Add throttling on the API Gateway with server-side throttling limits.->在具有服务器端限制限制的API网关上添加限制.
choices.B: Use DynamoDB Accelerator (DAX) and Lambda to buffer writes to DynamoDB.->使用DynamoDB加速器（DAX）和Lambda缓冲对DynamoDB的写入.
choices.C: Create a secondary index in DynamoDB for the table with the user requests.->在DynamoDB中为包含用户请求的表创建二级索引.
choices.D: Use the Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue and Lambda to buffer writes to DynamoDB.->使用Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）队列和Lambda缓冲对DynamoDB的写入.

ans_desc: SQS is best for decoupling and with API throttling you still ca loose request if it's over the limit and consumer application doesn't handle error 'Too many Req'SQS最适合解耦，并且通过API限制，如果超出限制并且消费者应用程序无法处理错误“太多请求”，您仍然会发出宽松的请求

body: A company is using Amazon DynamoDB with provisioned throughput for the database tier of its ecommerce website. During flash sales, customers experience periods of time when the database cannot handle the high number of transactions taking place. This causes the company to lose transactions During normal periods, the database performs appropriately. Which solution solves the performance problem the company faces?一家公司正在将Amazon DynamoDB用于其电子商务网站的数据库层的预配置吞吐量.在快速销售期间，客户会经历数据库无法处理大量交易的一段时间.这会导致公司丢失交易.在正常时期，数据库会正常运行.哪种解决方案可以解决公司面临的绩效问题？

choices.A: Switch DynamoDB to on-demand mode during flash sales->在闪存销售期间将DynamoDB切换到按需模式
choices.B: Implement DynamoDB Accelerator for fast in memory performance->实施DynamoDB Accelerator以提高内存性能
choices.C: Use Amazon Kinesis to queue transactions for processing to DynamoDB->使用Amazon Kinesis将事务排队以处理到DynamoDB
choices.D: Use Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) to queue transactions to DynamoDB->使用Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）将事务排队到DynamoDB

body: A company is developing a new machine learning model solution in AWS. The models are developed as independent microservices that fetch about 1 GB of model data from Amazon S3 at startup and load the data into memory. Users access the models through an asynchronous API. Users can send a request or a batch of requests and specify where the results should be sent. The company provides models to hundreds of users. The usage patterns for the models are irregular Some models could be unused for days or weeks. Other models could receive batches of thousands of requests at a time. Which solution meets these requirements?一家公司正在AWS中开发新的机器学习模型解决方案.这些模型是作为独立的微服务开发的，可在启动时从Amazon S3提取约1 GB的模型数据，并将数据加载到内存中.用户通过异步API访问模型.用户可以发送一个请求或一批请求，并指定应将结果发送到何处.该公司为数百个用户提供模型.这些模型的使用模式是不规则的.某些模型可能几天或几周都无法使用.其他模型可以一次接收成千上万的请求.哪种解决方案满足这些要求？

choices.A: The requests from the API are sent to an Application Load Balancer (ALB). Models are deployed as AWS Lambda functions invoked by the ALB.->来自API的请求被发送到应用程序负载平衡器（ALB）.模型被部署为ALB调用的AWS Lambda函数.
choices.B: The requests from the API are sent to the models Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue. Models are deployed as AWS Lambda functions triggered by SQS events AWS Auto Scaling is enabled on Lambda to increase the number of vCPUs based on the SQS queue size->来自API的请求被发送到模型Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）队列.将模型部署为由SQS事件触发的AWS Lambda函数，并在Lambda上启用AWS Auto Scaling以根据SQS队列大小增加vCPU的数量
choices.C: The requests from the API are sent to the model's Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue. Models are deployed as Amazon Elastic Container Service (Amazon ECS) services reading from the queue AWS App Mesh scales the instances of the ECS cluster based on the SQS queue size.->来自API的请求被发送到模型的Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）队列.将模型部署为从队列读取的Amazon Elastic Container Service（Amazon ECS）服务，AWS App Mesh根据SQS队列大小扩展ECS集群的实例.
choices.D: The requests from the API are sent to the models Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue. Models are deployed as Amazon Elastic Container Service (Amazon ECS) services reading from the queue AWS Auto Scaling is enabled on Amazon ECS for both the cluster and copies of the service based on the queue size.->来自API的请求被发送到模型Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）队列.将模型部署为从队列读取的Amazon Elastic Container Service（Amazon ECS）服务，并根据队列大小在Amazon ECS上为集群和服务副本启用了AWS Auto Scaling.

body: A recently created startup built a three-tier web application. The front end has static content. The application layer is based on microservices. User data is stored as JSON documents that need to be accessed with low latency. The company expects regular traffic to be low during the first year, with peaks in traffic when it publicizes new features every month. The startup team needs to minimize operational overhead costs. What should a solutions architect recommend to accomplish this?最近创建的一家初创公司构建了一个三层Web应用程序.前端具有静态内容.应用层基于微服务.用户数据存储为JSON文档，需要以低延迟进行访问.该公司预计第一年的常规流量会很低，每个月发布新功能时流量会达到峰值.启动团队需要最大程度地减少运营开销成本.解决方案架构师应建议什么来完成此任务？

choices.A: Use Amazon S3 static website hosting to store and serve the front end. Use AWS Elastic Beanstalk for the application layer. Use Amazon DynamoDB to store user data.->使用Amazon S3静态网站托管来存储和服务前端.将AWS Elastic Beanstalk用于应用程序层.使用Amazon DynamoDB存储用户数据.
choices.B: Use Amazon S3 static website hosting to store and serve the front end. Use Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) for the application layer. Use Amazon DynamoDB to store user data.->使用Amazon S3静态网站托管来存储和服务前端.将Amazon Elastic Kubernetes服务（Amazon EKS）用于应用程序层.使用Amazon DynamoDB存储用户数据.
choices.C: Use Amazon S3 static website hosting to store and serve the front end. Use Amazon API Gateway and AWS Lambda functions for the application layer. Use Amazon DynamoDB to store user data.->使用Amazon S3静态网站托管来存储和服务前端.将Amazon API Gateway和AWS Lambda函数用于应用程序层.使用Amazon DynamoDB存储用户数据.
choices.D: Use Amazon S3 static website hosting to store and serve the front end. Use Amazon API Gateway and AWS Lambda functions for the application layer. Use Amazon RDS with read replicas to store user data.->使用Amazon S3静态网站托管来存储和服务前端.将Amazon API Gateway和AWS Lambda函数用于应用程序层.将Amazon RDS与只读副本一起使用以存储用户数据.

body: A company's near-real-time streaming application is running on AWS. As the data is ingested a job runs on the data and takes 30 minutes to complete. The workload frequently experiences high latency due to large amounts of incoming data. A solutions architect needs to design a scalable and serverless solution to enhance performance. Which combination of steps should the solutions architect take? (Select TWO)公司的近实时流应用程序正在AWS上运行.提取数据后，作业将在数据上运行，并且需要30分钟才能完成.由于大量传入数据，工作负载经常遇到高延迟.解决方案架构师需要设计可扩展的无服务器解决方案以提高性能.解决方案架构师应采取哪些步骤组合？ （选择两个）

choices.A: Use Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose to ingest the data->使用Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose提取数据
choices.B: Use AWS Lambda with AWS Step Functions to process the data->结合使用AWS Lambda和AWS Step Functions来处理数据
choices.C: Use AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS) to ingest the data->使用AWS Database Migration Service（AWS DMS）提取数据
choices.D: Use Amazon EC2 instances in an Auto Scaling group to process the data->在Auto Scaling组中使用Amazon EC2实例来处理数据
choices.E: Use AWS Fargate with Amazon Elastic Container Service (Amazon ECS) to process the data.->将AWS Fargate与Amazon Elastic Container Service（Amazon ECS）结合使用来处理数据.

body: A solutions architect is developing a multiple-subnet VPC architecture. The solution will consist of six subnets in two Availability Zones. The subnets are defined as public, private and dedicated for databases. Only the Amazon EC2 instances running in the private subnets should be able to access a database. Which solution meets these requirements?解决方案架构师正在开发多子网VPC体系结构.该解决方案将由两个可用区中的六个子网组成.子网定义为公共，专用和专用于数据库.只有在私有子网中运行的Amazon EC2实例才能访问数据库.哪种解决方案满足这些要求？

choices.A: Create a now route table that excludes the route to the public subnets. CIDR blocks Associate the route table lo the database subnets.->创建一个现在的路由表，其中不包括到公共子网的路由. CIDR块将路由表与数据库子网相关联.
choices.B: Create a security group that denies ingress from the security group used by instances in the public subnets. Attach the security group to an Amazon RDS DB instance->创建一个安全组，该安全组拒绝来自公共子网中实例所使用的安全组的进入.将安全组附加到Amazon RDS数据库实例
choices.C: Create a security group that allows ingress from the security group used by instances in the private subnets. Attach the security group to an Amazon RDS DB instance.->创建一个安全组，该安全组允许从专用子网中的实例使用的安全组进入.将安全组附加到Amazon RDS数据库实例.
choices.D: Create a new peering connection between the public subnets and the private subnets. Create a different peering connection between the private subnets and the database subnets.->在公共子网和私有子网之间创建一个新的对等连接.在专用子网和数据库子网之间创建不同的对等连接.

body: An ecommerce website is deploying its web application as Amazon Elastic Container Service (Amazon ECS) container instances behind an Application Load Balancer (ALB). During periods of high activity, the website slows down and availability is reduced. A solutions architect uses Amazon CloudWatch alarms to receive notifications whenever there is an availability issue so they can scale out resources. Company management wants a solution that automatically responds to such events. Which solution meets these requirements?电子商务网站正在将其Web应用程序部署为Application Load Balancer（ALB）后面的Amazon Elastic Container Service（Amazon ECS）容器实例.在活跃期间，网站会变慢，可用性会降低.解决方案架构师会在存在可用性问题时使用Amazon CloudWatch警报接收通知，以便它们可以扩展资源.公司管理层需要一种能够自动响应此类事件的解决方案.哪种解决方案满足这些要求？

choices.A: Set up AWS Auto Scaling to scale out the ECS service when there are timeouts on the ALB. Set up AWS Auto Scaling to scale out the ECS cluster when the CPU or memory reservation is too high.->设置AWS Auto Scaling，以在ALB上存在超时时扩展ECS服务.设置AWS Auto Scaling以在CPU或内存预留量过高时扩展ECS集群.
choices.B: Set up AWS Auto Scaling to scale out the ECS service when the ALB CPU utilization is too high. Set up AWS Auto Scaling to scale out the ECS cluster when the CPU or memory reservation is too high.->设置AWS Auto Scaling以在ALB CPU利用率过高时扩展ECS服务.设置AWS Auto Scaling以在CPU或内存预留量过高时扩展ECS集群.
choices.C: Sot up AWS Auto Scaling to scale out the ECS service when the service's CPU utilization is too high. Set up AWS Auto Scaling to scale out the ECS cluster when the CPU or memory reservation is too high.->当服务的CPU使用率过高时，请提高AWS Auto Scaling的规模以扩展ECS服务.设置AWS Auto Scaling以在CPU或内存预留量过高时扩展ECS集群.
choices.D: Set up AWS Auto Scaling to scale out the ECS service when the ALB target group CPU utilization is too high. Set up AWS Auto Scaling to scale out the ECS cluster when the CPU or memory reservation is too high.->设置AWS Auto Scaling以在ALB目标组CPU利用率过高时扩展ECS服务.设置AWS Auto Scaling以在CPU或内存预留量过高时扩展ECS集群.

ans_desc: Option part one--->ALBRequestCountPerTarget ,Option second part---->ECSServiceAverageCPUUtilization and ECSServiceAverageMemoryUtilization

body: A company is using a fleet of Amazon EC2 instances to ingest data from on-premises data sources. The data is in JSON format and ingestion rates can be as high as 1 MB/s. When an EC2 instance is rebooted, the data in-flight is lost. The company's data science team wants to query ingested data in near-real time. Which solution provides near-real-time data querying that is scalable with minimal data loss?一家公司正在使用Amazon EC2实例团队从本地数据源提取数据.数据为JSON格式，接收速率可高达1 MB / s.重新引导EC2实例时，运行中的数据将丢失.该公司的数据科学团队希望近乎实时地查询摄取的数据.哪种解决方案可提供可伸缩且数据丢失最少的近实时数据查询？

choices.A: Publish data to Amazon Kinesis Data Streams. Use Kinesis Data Analytics to query the data.->将数据发布到Amazon Kinesis Data Streams.使用Kinesis Data Analytics查询数据.
choices.B: Publish data to Amazon Kinesis Data firehose with Amazon Redshift as the destination. Use Amazon Redshift to query the data.->将数据发布到以Amazon Redshift为目的地的Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose.使用Amazon Redshift查询数据.
choices.C: Store ingested data in an EC2 instance store Publish data to Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose with Amazon S3 as the destination. Use Amazon Athena to query the data.->将提取的数据存储在EC2实例存储中，将数据发布到以Amazon S3为目的地的Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose.使用Amazon Athena查询数据.
choices.D: Store ingested data in an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume. Publish data to Amazon ElastiCache for Redis. Subscribe to the Redis channel to query the data.->将提取的数据存储在Amazon Elastic Block Store（Amazon EBS）卷中.将数据发布到Amazon ElastiCache for Redis.订阅Redis频道以查询数据.

body: A company has an on-premises MySQL database used by the global sales team with infrequent access patterns. The sales team requires the database to have minimal downtime. A database administrator wants to migrate this database to AWS without selecting a particular instance type in anticipation of more users in the future. Which service should a solution architect recommend?一家公司拥有一个本地MySQL数据库，该数据库由全球销售团队使用，并且访问模式很少.销售团队要求数据库的停机时间最少.数据库管理员希望将此数据库迁移到AWS而不选择特定实例类型，以防将来会有更多用户.解决方案架构师应推荐哪种服务？

choices.A: Amazon Aurora MySQL
choices.B: Amazon Aurora Serverless for MySQL->适用于MySQL的Amazon Aurora无服务器
choices.C: Amazon Redshift Spectrum
choices.D: Amazon RDS for MySQL->适用于MySQL的Amazon RDS

body: A company is planning to transfer multiple terabytes of data to AWS. The data is collected offline from ships. The company want to run complex transformation before transferring the data. Which AWS service should a solutions architect recommend for this migration?一家公司计划将多个TB的数据传输到AWS.数据是从船上离线收集的.该公司希望在传输数据之前进行复杂的转换.解决方案架构师应为此迁移建议哪种AWS服务？

choices.A: AWS Snowball
choices.B: AWS Snowmobile
choices.C: AWS Snowball Edge Storage Optimize->AWS Snowball Edge Storage优化
choices.D: AWS Snowball Edge Compute Optimize->AWS Snowball Edge Compute优化

body: A company hosts its web application on AWS using seven Amazon EC2 instances. The company requires that the IP addresses of all healthy EC2 instances be returned in response to DNS queries. Which policy should be used to meet this requirement?一家公司使用七个Amazon EC2实例将其Web应用程序托管在AWS上.该公司要求返回所有正常EC2实例的IP地址以响应DNS查询.应该使用哪个策略来满足此要求？

choices.A: Simple routing policy->简单的路由策略
choices.B: Latency routing policy->延迟路由策略
choices.C: Multivalue routing policy->多值路由策略
choices.D: Geolocation routing policy ->地理位置路由策略

body: A company stores user data in AWS. The data is used continuously with peak usage during business hours. Access patterns vary, with some data not being used for months at a time. A solution architect must choose a cost that maintains the highest level ot durability while maintaining high availability. Which storage solution meets these requirements?一家公司在AWS中存储用户数据.数据在工作时间内连续使用，并且使用高峰.访问方式各不相同，有些数据一次不能使用几个月.解决方案架构师必须选择在维持最高可用性的同时保持高可用性的成本.哪种存储解决方案满足这些要求？

choices.A: Amazon S3 Standard->Amazon S3标准
choices.B: Amazon S3 intelligent Tiering->Amazon S3智能分层
choices.C: Amazon S3 Glacier Deep Archive->Amazon S3 Glacier Deep存档
choices.D: Amazon S3 One Zone-Infrequent Access (S3 One Zone-IA)->Amazon S3一区不频繁访问（S3 One Zone-IA）

body: A company is developing a video conversion application hosted on AWS. The application will be available in two tiers:a free tier and a paid tier. Users in the paid tier will have their videos converted first and then the tree tier users will have their videos converted. Which solution meets these requirements and is MOST cost-effective?一家公司正在开发托管在AWS上的视频转换应用程序.该应用程序将分为两层:免费层和付费层.付费层的用户将首先对其视频进行转换，然后树级用户将对其视频进行转换.哪种解决方案符合这些要求，并且最具成本效益？

choices.A: One FIFO queue for the paid tier and one standard queue for the free tier->付费层有一个FIFO队列，免费层有一个标准队列
choices.B: A single FIFO Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue for all file types->适用于所有文件类型的单个FIFO Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）队列
choices.C: A single standard Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue for all file types->适用于所有文件类型的单个标准Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）队列

body: A solution architect is designing a solution that involves orchestrating a series of Amazon Elastic Container Service (Amazon ECS) task types running on Amazon EC2 instances that are part of an ECS cluster. The output and state data for all tasks needs to be stored. The amount of data output by each task is approximately 10 MB, and there could be hundreds of tasks running at a time. The system should be optimized for high frequency reading and writing. As old outputs are archived and deleted the storage size is not expected to exceed 1 TB. Which storage solution should the solution architect recommend? 解决方案架构师正在设计一种解决方案，其中涉及协调在ECS集群的一部分Amazon EC2实例上运行的一系列Amazon Elastic Container Service(Amazon ECS)任务类型. 所有任务的输出和状态数据都需要存储. 每个任务输出的数据量约为10 MB，并且一次可能运行数百个任务. 该系统应针对高频读写进行优化. 随着旧输出的归档和删除，存储大小预计不会超过1 TB. 解决方案架构师应建议哪种存储解决方案？

choices.A: An Amazon DynamoDB table accessible by all ECS cluster instances.->所有ECS集群实例均可访问的Amazon DynamoDB表.
choices.B: An Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) with Provisioned Throughput mode.->具有预配置吞吐量模式的Amazon Elastic File System(Amazon EFS).
choices.C: An Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) file system with Bursting Throughput mode.->具有突发吞吐量模式的Amazon Elastic File System(Amazon EFS)文件系统.
choices.D: An Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume mounted to the ECS cluster instances.->安装到ECS集群实例的Amazon Elastic Block Store(Amazon EBS)卷.

ans_desc:
Provisioned Throughput = you can instantly provision the throughput of your file system (in MiB/s) independent of the amount of data stored.Brusting Throughput= Amazon EFS scales as the size of your file system in the standard storage class grows. In question they mentioned As old outputs are archived and deleted, the storage size is not expected to exceed 1 TB.

预置吞吐量=您可以立即预置文件系统的吞吐量（以MiB / s为单位），而与存储的数据量无关。阻塞吞吐量= Amazon EFS随着标准存储类中文件系统大小的增长而扩展。 他们提到的问题是，随着旧输出的归档和删除，存储大小预计不会超过1 TB

body: A company has an automobile sales website that stores its listings in an database on Amazon RDS. Which design should a solutions architect recommend?一家公司有一个汽车销售网站,该网站在Amazon rds上的一个数据库中存储其产品列表.当一辆汽车被出售时,需要从网站上删除列表,并且数据必须发送到多个目标系统.解决方案架构师应该推荐哪种设计?

choices.A: Create an AWS Lambda function triggered when the database on Amazon RDS is updated to send the information to an Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue for the targets to consume.->创建一个AWS Lambda函数,在更新Amazon RDS上的数据库时触发,以将信息发送到Amazon 简单队列服务(Amazon SQS)队列,供目标使用.
choices.B: Create an AWS Lambda function triggered when the database on Amazon RDS is updated to send the information to an Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) FIFO queue for the targets to consume->创建一个AWS Lambda函数,在更新Amazon RDS上的数据库时触发,以将信息发送到Amazon 简单队列服务(Amazon SQS)FIFO队列,供目标使用
choices.C: Subscribe to an RDS event notification and send an Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue fanned out to multiple Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topics. Use AWS Lambda functions to update the targets->订阅RDS事件通知并向多个Amazon 简单通知服务(Amazon SNS)主题发送一个Amazon 简单队列服务(Amazon SQS)队列.使用AWS Lambda函数更新目标
choices.D: Subscribe to an RDS event notification and send an Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic fanned out to multiple Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queues. Use AWS Lambda functions to update the targets->订阅RDS事件通知并向多个Amazon simplequeueservice(Amazon sqs)队列发送Amazon simplenotificationservice(Amazon sns)主题.使用AWS Lambda函数更新目标

ans_desc:
Answer: D - RDS writes to SNS which you can than fan out to multiple SQS (one for each target system)

Not true: A - one Amazon Simple Queue Service queue = only one target system can read a message

Not true: B - one Amazon Simple Queue Service queue = only one target system can read a message

Not true: C - RDS is sending messages to SNS so you can not fan out SQS to SNS because there is no message in SQS

body: A company has a three-tier, stateless web application. The company's web and application tiers run on Amazon BC2 instances in an Auto Scaling group with an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) root volume, and the database tier runs on Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL. The company's recovery point objective (RPO) is 2 hours. What should a solutions architect recommend to enable backups for this environment?一家公司有一个三层的无状态web应用程序.该公司的web和应用程序层在Amazon BC2实例上运行,该实例是一个自动伸缩组,具有Amazon Elastic Block Store(Amazon EBS)根卷,数据库层在Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL上运行.公司的恢复点目标(RPO)是2小时.解决方案架构师应该推荐什么来支持此环境的备份?

choices.A: Take snapshots of EBS volumes of the EC2 instances and database every 2 hours->每2小时拍摄一次EC2实例和数据库的EBS卷快照
choices.B: Configure a snapshot lifecycle policy to take EBS snapshots and configure an automated database backup in Amazon RDS to meet the RPO->配置快照生命周期策略以获取EBS快照,并在Amazon RDS中配置自动数据库备份以满足RPO要求
choices.C: Take snapshots of EBS volumes of the EC2 instances every 2 hours Configure automated database backup in Amazon RDS so that it runs every 2 hours->每2小时拍摄EC2实例的EBS卷快照在Amazon RDS中配置自动数据库备份,使其每2小时运行一次
choices.D: Retain the latest Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) of the web and application tiers Configure daily Amazon RDS snapshots and use point-in-time recovery to meet the RPO.->保留web和应用层的最新Amazon 机器映像(AMI),配置每日Amazon RDS快照,并使用时间点恢复来满足RPO要求.

ans_desc: RPO designates the variable amount of data that will be lost or will have to be re-entered during network downtime.RTO is the maximum acceptable delay between the interruption of service and restoration of service. This determines what is considered an acceptable time window when service is unavailable

body: A company is running a database on Amazon Aurora. The database is idle every evening. An application that performs extensive reads on the database experiences performance issues during morning thus when user traffic spikes. During these peak periods, the application receives timeout errors when reading from the database. The company does not have a dedicated operations team and needs an automated solution to address the performance issues. (Select TWO )一家公司正在Amazon Aurora上运行一个数据库.数据库每天晚上都是空闲的.对数据库执行大量读取的应用程序在早晨遇到性能问题,因此当用户流量激增时.在这些峰值期间,应用程序从数据库读取数据时会收到超时错误.公司没有专门的运营团队,需要一个自动化的解决方案来解决性能问题.解决方案架构师应该采取哪些操作来自动调整以适应数据库上不断增加的读取负载?(选择两个)

body: A company runs an application in the AWS Cloud and uses Amazon DynamoDB as the database. The company deploys Amazon EC2 instances to a private network to process data from the database. The company uses two NAT instances to provide connectivity to DynamoDB. The company wants to retire the NAT instances. body: A company is running its application in a single region on Amazon EC2 with Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) and S3 as part of the storage design. body: A company is running an application on Amazon EC2 instances hosted in a private subnet of a VPC . body: After reviewing the cost optimization checks in AWS Trusted Advisor, a team finds that it has 10,000 Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) snapshots in its account that are more than 30 days old. choices.A: Create and schedule a backup plan with AWS Backup->使用AWS备份创建和计划备份计划
choices.B: Copy the EBS snapshots to Amazon S3 and then create lifecycle configurations in the S3 bucket->将EBS快照复制到Amazon s3,然后在S3 bucket中创建生命周期配置
choices.C: Use Amazon Data Lifecycle Manager (Amazon DLM)->使用Amazon Data Lifecycle Manager(Amazon DLM)
choices.D: Use a scheduled event in Amazon EventBridge (Amazon CloudWatch Events) and invoke AWS Step Functions to manage the snapshots->使用Amazon eventbridge(Amazon cloudwatchevents)中的计划事件并调用AWS Step函数来管理快照
choices.E: Schedule and run backups in AWS Systems Manager.->在AWS Systems Manager中计划和运行备份.

body: A company runs a legacy application with a single-tier architecture on an Amazon EC2 instance Disk I/O is low. With occasional small spikes during business hours. body: A company is building a cloud storage and sharing application for photos. Users can upload photos from their computers and mobile phones to be stored durably in the cloud. After photos are uploaded, most are shared and downloaded frequently for the first 40-90 days. The photos are generally accessed less often after 90 days but some photos maintain a high access rate. Which strategy should the solutions architect use to meet these requirements MOST cost-effectively?一家公司正在为照片构建云存储和共享应用程序.用户可以从他们的电脑和手机上传照片,以便在云中持久存储.照片上传后,在最初的40-90天内,大部分照片会被频繁分享和下载.这些照片通常在90天后很少被访问,但有些照片的访问率很高.应用程序最初将照片存储在Amazon s3标准中.解决方案架构师需要在不牺牲用户体验或数据持久性的情况下降低应用程序的操作成本.解决方案架构师应该使用哪种策略来最经济高效地满足这些需求?

choices.D: Define an S3 Lifecycle rule to transition objects from S3 Standard to S3 One Zone-Infrequent Access (S3 One zone-IA) after 90 days->定义一个S3生命周期规则,在90天后将对象从S3标准转换为S3一区不频繁访问(S3一区IA)

body: A solutions architect is designing a shared storage solution for a web application that is deployed across multiple Availability Zones. choices.A: Create an Amazon S3 bucket to store the web content Use Amazon CloudFront to deliver the content.->创建一个Amazon s3 bucket来存储web内容使用Amazon cloudfront交付内容.

body: A company designs a mobile app for its customers to upload photos to a website. The app needs a secure login with multi-factor authentication (MFA). body: A company is using an Amazon S3 bucket to store data uploaded by different departments from multiple locations. body: The DNS provider that hosts a company's domain name records is experiencing outages that cause service disruption for a website running on AWS. choices.A: Create an Amazon Route 53 public hosted zone for the domain name. Import the zone file containing the domain records hosted by the previous provider.->为域名创建Amazon Route 53公共托管区域.导入包含上一个提供程序托管的域记录的区域文件.

body: A solutions architect needs to host a high performance computing (HPC) workload in the AWS Cloud. The workload will run on hundreds of Amazon EC2 instances and will require parallel access to a shared file system to enable distributed processing of large datasets. Datasets will be accessed across multiple instances simultaneously. The workload requires access latency within 1 ms. After processing has completed, engineer will need access to the dataset for manual postprocessing. choices.D: Configure AWS Resource Access Manager to share an Amazon S3 bucket so that it can be mounted to all instances for processing and postprocessing->将AWS资源访问管理器配置为共享Amazon s3 bucket,以便可以将其装载到所有实例上进行处理和后处理

body: A company seeks a storage solution for its application. The solution must be highly available and scalable. The solution also must function as a file system, be mountable by multiple Linux instances in AWS and on premises through native protocols, and have no minimum size requirements. body: A company wants to migrate its 1PB on-premises image repository to AWS. The images will be used by a serverless web application Images stored in the repository are rarely accessed, but they must be immediately available. choices.A: Implement client-side encryption and store the images in an Amazon S3 Glacier vault Set a vault lock to prevent accidental deletion.->实现客户端加密并将图像存储在Amazon s3冰川保险库中设置保险库锁以防止意外删除.
choices.B: Store the images in an Amazon S3 bucket in the S3 Standard-Infrequent Access (S3 Standard-IA) storage class Enable versioning:default encryption, and MFA Delete on the S3 bucket->将图像存储在S3标准不频繁访问(S3标准IA)存储类的Amazon S3存储桶中启用版本控制:默认加密和S3存储桶上的MFA删除
choices.C: Store the images in an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file share Configure the Amazon FSx file share to use an AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) to encrypt the images in the file share Use NTFS permission sets on the images to prevent accidental deletion->将图像存储在Amazon FSx for Windows文件服务器文件共享中配置Amazon FSx文件共享以使用AWS密钥管理服务(AWS KMS)客户主密钥(CMK)对文件共享中的图像进行加密对图像使用NTFS权限集以防意外删除
choices.D: Store the images in an Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) file share in the Infrequent Access storage class. Configure the EFS file share to use an AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) to encrypt the images in the file share Use NFS permission set on the images to prevent accidental deletion.->将图像存储在不常访问存储类中的Amazon elastic文件系统(Amazon efs)文件共享中.配置EFS文件共享以使用AWS密钥管理服务(AWS KMS)客户主密钥(CMK)加密文件共享中的映像使用对映像设置的NFS权限以防止意外删除.

body: A company needs to run its external website on Amazon EC2 instances and on-premises virtualized servers. The AWS environment has a 1 GB AWS Direct Connect connection to the data center. The company needs a solution with the lowest operational overhead to handle this split traffic. What should a solutions architect do to meet these requirements?公司需要在Amazon ec2实例和内部虚拟服务器上运行其外部网站.AWS环境具有到数据中心的1GB AWS直连连接.应用程序的IP地址不会更改.如果发生故障,本地服务器和AWS服务器能够在保持相同IP地址的同时自行重启.一些网站用户必须将其供应商添加到允许列表中,因此解决方案必须具有固定的IP地址.公司需要一个具有最低运营开销的解决方案来处理这种分离的流量.解决方案架构师应该如何满足这些需求?

choices.A: Deploy an Amazon Route 53 Resolver with rules pointing to the on-premises and AWS IP addresses->部署Amazon 路由53解析器,规则指向本地和AWS IP地址

choices.D: Deploy Amazon API Gateway to direct traffic to the on-premises and AWS IP addresses based on the header of he equest.->部署Amazon api网关,根据heequest的报头将流量定向到本地和AWS IP地址.

body: A company runs a web-based portal that provides users with global breaking news, local alerts, and weather updates. How should a solutions architect design the application to ensure the LEAST amount of latency for all users?一家公司运行一个基于网络的门户网站,为用户提供全球突发新闻.本地警报和天气更新.门户通过混合使用静态和动态内容为每个用户提供个性化视图.内容通过HTTPS通过运行在应用程序负载均衡器(ALB)后面的Amazon EC2实例上的API服务器提供.该公司希望门户网站能尽快向全球用户提供这些内容.解决方案架构师应该如何设计应用程序以确保所有用户的延迟最少?

choices.A: Deploy the application stack in a ingle AWS Region Use Amazon CloudFront to serve all static and dynamic content by specifying the ALB as an origin->在单个AWS区域中部署应用程序堆栈使用Amazon cloudfront通过指定ALB作为源来服务所有静态和动态内容

choices.D: Deploy t e application stack in two AWS Regions Use an Amazon Route 53 geolocation routing policy to serve all content from the ALB in the closest Region.->在两个AWS区域部署应用程序堆栈使用Amazon Route 53地理位置路由策略为最近区域中ALB的所有内容提供服务.

body: A company provides a three-tier web application to its customers. Each customer has an AWS account in which the application is deployed, and these accounts are members of the company's organization in AWS Organizations. To protect its customers' AWS accounts and applications the company wants to monitor them for unusual and unexpected behavior. The company needs to analyze and monitor customer VPC Flow Logs. AWS CloudTrail logs, and DNS logs. What should a solutions architect do to meet these requirements?一家公司向其客户提供三层web应用程序.每个客户都有一个部署应用程序的AWS帐户,这些帐户是AWS组织中公司组织的成员.为了保护客户的AWS帐户和应用程序,该公司希望监控他们的异常和意外行为.公司需要分析和监控客户专有网络流量日志.AWS CloudTrail日志和DNS日志.解决方案架构师应该如何满足这些需求?

choices.A: Designate an account in the organization as the AWS Shield master account Enable Shield and Shield logs in every account and invite the accounts to join the Shield master account Analyze Shield findings m the Shield master account->在组织中指定一个帐户作为AWS Shield master帐户启用Shield和Shield登录每个帐户并邀请帐户加入Shield master帐户Analyze Shield findings m the Shield master帐户
choices.B: Designate an account in the organization as the Amazon GuardDuty master account Enable GuardDuty in every account and invite the accounts to join the GuardDuty master account Analyze GuardDuty finding in the GuardDuty master account->将组织中的一个帐户指定为Amazon GuardDuty主帐户在每个帐户中启用GuardDuty并邀请帐户加入GuardDuty主帐户分析GuardDuty主帐户中的GuardDuty查找
choices.C: Designate an account in the organization as the AWS WAF master account Enable AWS WAF and AWS WAF logs in every account and invite the accounts to join the AWS WAF master account Analyze AWS WAF logs in the AWS WAF master account->将组织中的一个帐户指定为AWS WAF主帐户启用每个帐户中的AWS WAF和AWS WAF日志,并邀请帐户加入AWS WAF主帐户分析AWS WAF主帐户中的AWS WAF日志
choices.D: Designate an account in the organization as the AWS Resource Access Manager (AWS RAM) master account Enable AWS RAM in every account, and invite the accounts to join the AWS RAM master account Analyze AWS RAM logs in the AWS RAM master account->在组织中指定一个帐户作为AWS资源访问管理器(AWS RAM)主帐户在每个帐户中启用AWS RAM,并邀请帐户加入AWS RAM主帐户分析AWS RAM主帐户中的AWS RAM日志

body: A company runs analytics software on Amazon EC2 instances. The software accepts job requests from users to process data that has been uploaded to Amazon S3. Users report that some submitted data is not being processed Amazon CloudWatch reveals that the EC2 instances have a consistent CPU utilization at or near 100%. The company wants to improve system performance and scale the system based on user load. What should a solutions architect do to meet these requirements?一家公司在Amazon EC2实例上运行分析软件.该软件接受用户的作业请求,处理上传到Amazon s3的数据.用户报告说一些提交的数据没有得到处理Amazon CloudWatch显示EC2实例的CPU利用率一直保持在或接近100%.该公司希望提高系统性能,并根据用户负载扩展系统.解决方案架构师应该如何满足这些需求?

choices.A: Create a copy of the instance Place all instances behind an Application Load Balancer->创建实例的副本将所有实例放在应用程序负载平衡器后面
choices.B: Create an S3 VPC endpoint for Amazon S3 Update the software to reference the endpoint.->为Amazon s3创建一个s3vpc端点更新软件以引用该端点.
choices.C: Stop the EC2 instances Modify the instance type to one with a more powerful CPU and more memory Restart the instances->停止EC2实例将实例类型修改为具有更强大CPU和更多内存的实例重新启动实例
choices.D: Route incoming requests to Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) Configure an EC2 Auto Scaling group based on queue size Update the software to read from the queue->将传入请求路由到Amazon simplequeueservice(Amazon sqs)根据队列大小配置EC2自动伸缩组更新软件以从队列中读取

body: A company uses Amazon S3 for storing a variety of files. A solutions architect needs to design a feature that will allow users to instantly restore any deleted files within 30 days of deletion. Which is the MOST cost-efficient solution?一家公司使用Amazon s3存储各种文件.解决方案架构师需要设计一种功能,允许用户在删除后30天内立即恢复任何已删除的文件.哪种解决方案最具成本效益?

choices.A: Create lifecycle policies that move the objects to Amazon S3 Glacier and delete them after 30 days->创建生命周期策略,将对象移动到Amazon S3 Glacier,并在30天后将其删除
choices.B: Enable Cross-Region Replication Empty the replica bucket every 30 days using an AWS Lambda function->启用跨区域复制使用AWS Lambda函数每30天清空一次副本存储桶
choices.C: Enable versioning and create a lifecycle policy to remove expired versions after 30 days.->启用版本控制并创建生命周期策略以在30天后删除过期版本.
choices.D: Enable versioning and MFA Delete Using a Lambda function remove MFA Delete from objects more than 30 days old->使用Lambda函数启用版本控制和MFA Delete从超过30天的对象中删除MFA Delete

body: A company is making a prototype of the infrastructure for its new website by manually provisioning the necessary infrastructure. This infrastructure includes an Auto Scaling group an Application Load Balancer, and an Amazon RDS database. After the configuration has been thoroughly validated the company wants the capability to immediately deploy the infrastructure for development and production use in two Availability Zones in an automated fashion. What should a solutions architect recommend to meet these requirements?一家公司正在为其新网站制作一个基础设施原型,通过手动配置必要的基础设施.这个基础设施包括一个自动伸缩组.一个应用程序负载平衡器和一个Amazon rds数据库.在对配置进行彻底验证之后,公司希望能够立即以自动化的方式在两个可用性区域部署用于开发和生产的基础设施.解决方案架构师应该推荐什么来满足这些需求?

choices.A: Use AWS Systems Manager to replicate and provision the prototype infrastructure in two Availability Zones->使用AWS Systems Manager在两个可用性区域中复制和配置原型基础结构
choices.B: Define the infrastructure as a template by using the prototype infrastructure as a guide Deploy the infrastructure with AWS CloudFormation->以原型基础设施为指导,将基础设施定义为模板使用AWS CloudFormation部署基础设施
choices.C: Use AWS Config to record the inventory of resources that are used in the prototype infrastructure Use AWS Config to deploy the prototype infrastructure into two Availability Zones.->使用AWS Config记录原型基础结构中使用的资源的清单使用AWS Config将原型基础结构部署到两个可用性区域中.
choices.D: Use AWS Elastic Beanstalk and configure it to use an automated reference to the prototype infrastructure to automatically deploy new environments in two Availability Zones->使用AWS Elastic Beanstalk并将其配置为使用对原型基础结构的自动引用,以便在两个可用性区域中自动部署新环境

body: A solutions architect is designing a system that will store personally identifiable information (Pll) in an Amazon S3 bucket. Due to compliance and regulatory requirements, both the master keys and the unencrypted data should never be sent to AWS. Which Amazon S3 encryption technique should the architect choose?解决方案架构师正在设计一个系统,该系统将个人识别信息(Pll)存储在Amazon S3存储桶中.由于法规遵从性和监管要求,主密钥和未加密的数据都不应发送给AWS.架构师应该选择哪种Amazon s3加密技术?

choices.A: Amazon S3 client-side encryption with an AWS Key Management Service {AWS KMS) managed customer master key (CMK)->Amazon s3客户端加密,使用AWS密钥管理服务{AWS KMS)管理的客户主密钥(CMK)
choices.B: Amazon S3 server-side encryption with AWS KMS managed encryption keys (SSE-KMS)->使用AWS KMS托管加密密钥(SSE-KMS)的Amazon S3服务器端加密
choices.C: Amazon S3 client-side encryption with a client-side master key->使用客户端主密钥的Amazon s3客户端加密
choices.D: Amazon S3 server-side encryption with customer-provided encryption keys (SSE-C)->Amazon S3服务器端加密,使用客户提供的加密密钥(SSE-C)

ans_desc:
Client-side encryption refers to encrypting data on the client side of your application before sending it to Amazon S3. You have the following two options for using data encryption keys:

Use an AWS KMS-managed customer master key.

Use a client-side master key.

When using client-side encryption, you retain end-to-end control of the encryption process,

including management of the encryption keys.

body: A company uses an Amazon S3 bucket as its data lake storage platform. The S3 bucket contains a massive amount of data that is accessed randomly by multiple teams and hundreds of applications. The company wants to reduce the S3 storage costs and provide immediate availability for frequently accessed objects. What is the MOST operationally efficient solution that meets these requirements?一家公司使用Amazon s3存储桶作为其数据湖存储平台.S3存储桶包含大量的数据,这些数据由多个团队和数百个应用程序随机访问.该公司希望降低S3存储成本,并为频繁访问的对象提供即时可用性.满足这些要求的操作效率最高的解决方案是什么?

choices.A: Create an S3 Lifecycle rule to transition objects to the S3 Intelligent-Tiering storage class->创建S3生命周期规则以将对象转换到S3智能分层存储类
choices.B: Store objects in Amazon S3 Glacier Use S3 Select to provide applications with access to the data->在Amazon s3glacier中存储对象使用s3select为应用程序提供对数据的访问
choices.C: Use data from S3 storage class analysis to create S3 Lifecycle rules to automatically transition objects to the S3 Standard-Infrequent Access {S3 Standard-IA) storage class->使用S3存储类分析中的数据创建S3生命周期规则,以自动将对象转换到S3标准不频繁访问{S3标准IA)存储类
choices.D: Transition objects to the S3 Standard-Infrequent Access (S3 Standard-IA) storage class Create an AWS Lambda function to transition objects to the S3 Standard storage class when they are accessed by an application->将对象转换为S3标准不频繁访问(S3标准IA)存储类创建AWS Lambda函数,以便在应用程序访问对象时将其转换为S3标准存储类

body: A company wants to create an application that will transmit protected health information (PHI) to thousands of service consumers in different AWS accounts. The application servers will sit in private VPC subnets The routing for the application must be fault tolerant. What should be done to meet these requirements?一家公司希望创建一个应用程序,将受保护的健康信息(PHI)传输到不同AWS帐户中的数千个服务消费者.应用服务器将位于专用VPC子网中,应用程序的路由必须是容错的.为了满足这些要求,应该做些什么?

choices.A: Create a VPC endpoint service and grant permissions to specific service consumers to create a connection->创建VPC端点服务并向特定服务使用者授予创建连接的权限
choices.B: Create a virtual private gateway connection between each pair of service provider VPCs and service consumer VPCs->在每对服务提供商专有网络和服务消费者专有网络之间创建虚拟专用网关连接
choices.C: Create an internal Application Load Balancer in the service provider VPC and put application servers behind it.->在服务提供商VPC中创建一个内部应用程序负载均衡器,并将应用程序服务器置于其后面.
choices.D: Create a proxy server in the service provider VPC to route requests from service consumers to the application servers.->在服务提供商专有网络中创建一个代理服务器,将服务使用者的请求路由到应用服务器.

body: Cost Explorer is showing charges higher than expected for Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes connected to application servers in a production account. A significant portion of the changes from Amazon EBS are from volumes that were created as Provisioned IOPS SSD (101) volume types Controlling costs is the highest priority for this application. Which steps should the user take to analyze and reduce the EBS costs without incurring any application downtime? (Select TWO ) Cost Explorer显示,Amazon Elastic Block Store(Amazon EBS)卷连接到生产帐户中的应用服务器的费用高于预期.Amazon EBS的很大一部分更改来自作为配置IOPS SSD(101)卷类型创建的卷控制成本是此应用程序的最高优先级.用户应该采取哪些步骤来分析和降低EBS成本,而不会导致任何应用程序停机?(选择两个)

choices.A: Use the Amazon EC2 ModifylnstanceAttribute action to enable EBS optimization on the application server instances->使用Amazon ec2 ModifylnstanceAttribute操作在应用服务器实例上启用EBS优化
choices.B: Use the Amazon CloudWatch GetMetricData action to evaluate the read write operations and read/write bytes of each volume->使用Amazon CloudWatch GetMetricData操作来评估每个卷的读写操作和读/写字节
choices.C: Use the Amazon EC2 ModifyVolume action to reduce the size of the underutilized 101 volumes->使用Amazon ec2 ModifyVolume操作来减小未充分利用的卷的大小
choices.D: Use the Amazon EC2 ModifyVolume action to change the volume type of the underutilized io1 volumes to General Purpose SSD (gp2)->使用Amazon EC2 ModifyVolume操作将未充分利用的io1卷的卷类型更改为通用SSD(gp2)
choices.E: Use an Amazon S3 PutBucketPolicy action to migrate existing volume snapshots to Amazon S3 Glacier->使用Amazon s3putbucketpolicy操作将现有卷快照迁移到Amazon s3glacier

body: A company hosts a popular web application. The web application connects to a database running in a private VPC subnet. The web servers must be accessible only to customers on an SSL connection. The Amazon RDS fo MySQL database services be accessible only from the web servers. How should a solution architect design a solution to meet the requirements without impacting applications?一家公司拥有一个流行的web应用程序.web应用程序连接到运行在专用VPC子网中的数据库.web服务器必须只能由SSL连接上的客户访问.Amazon RDS fo MySQL数据库服务只能从web服务器访问.解决方案架构师应该如何设计解决方案以满足需求而不影响应用程序?

choices.A: Create a network ACL on the web server's subnet and allow HTTPS inbound and MySQL outbound. Place both database and web servers on the same subnet.->在web服务器的子网上创建网络ACL,并允许HTTPS入站和MySQL出站.将数据库和web服务器放在同一子网上.
choices.B: Open an HTTPS port on the security group for web server and set the source to 0. 0. 0.0/0. Open the MySQL port on the database security group and attach it to the MySQL instance. Set the source to web server security group.->在web服务器的安全组上打开HTTPS端口,并将源设置为0.00.0/0. 打开数据库安全组上的MySQL端口并将其附加到MySQL实例.将源设置为web服务器安全组.
choices.C: Create a network ACL on the web server's subnet, allow HTTP, allow inbound and specify the source as 0 .0 .0 .0/0. Create a network ACL on a database subnet allow MySQL port inbound for web servers and deny all outbound traffic.->在web服务器的子网上创建网络ACL,允许HTTP,允许入站,并将源指定为0.0.0.0/0.在数据库子网上创建网络ACL,允许web服务器的MySQL端口入站并拒绝所有出站流量.
choices.D: Open the MySQL port on the security group for web servers and set the source to 0.0.0.0/0. Open the HTTPS port on the database security group and attach it to the MySQL instance. Set the source to web server security group.->打开web服务器安全组上的MySQL端口,并将源代码设置为0.0.0.0/0.打开数据库安全组上的HTTPS端口并将其附加到MySQL实例.将源设置为web服务器安全组.

body: An online retailer has a series of flash sales occurring every Friday. Sales Traffic will increase during the sales only and the platform will handle the increased load. The platform is a three-tier application. The web tier runs on Amazon EC2 instances behind an Application Load Balancer. Amazon CloudFront is used to reduce web server load, but many requests for dynamic content must go to the web servers. What should be done to the web tier to reduce costs without impacting performance or reliability?在线零售商每周五都有一系列的抢购活动.仅在销售期间,销售流量将增加,平台将处理增加的负载.该平台是一个三层应用程序.web层在应用程序负载平衡器后面的Amazon ec2实例上运行.Amazon cloudfront用于减少web服务器的负载,但是许多对动态内容的请求必须转到web服务器.在不影响性能或可靠性的情况下,应该对web层做些什么来降低成本?

choices.A: Use T-series instances->使用T系列实例
choices.B: Purchase scheduled Reserved instances.->购买预定的保留实例.
choices.C: Implement Amazon ElasticCache->实现Amazon ElasticCache
choices.D: Use Spot instances.->使用点实例.

body: A company has concerns about its Amazon RDS database. The workload is unpredictable, and periodic floods of new user registrations can cause he company to run out storage. The database runs on a general purpose instance with 300 GB of storage. What should a solution architect recommend to the company?一家公司对其Amazon RDS数据库表示担忧.工作量是不可预测的,新用户注册的周期性洪流可能会导致公司耗尽存储空间.数据库运行在一个具有300 GB存储空间的通用实例上.解决方案架构师应该向公司推荐什么?

choices.A: Enable RDS storage autoscaling.->启用RDS存储自动缩放.
choices.B: Schedule vertical instance scaling->计划垂直实例缩放
choices.C: Change to a storage optimized instance type and vertically scale the database.->更改为存储优化实例类型并垂直扩展数据库.
choices.D: Configure an AWS Lambda function to increase RDS storage by 1 GiB when storage space is low.->配置一个AWS Lambda函数,在存储空间不足时将RDS存储空间增加1gib.

body: A company is hosting its website by using Amazon EC2 instance behind an Elastic Load Balancer across multiple Availability Zones. The instance run in an EC2 Auto Scaling group. The website uses Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes to store product manuals for users to download. The company updates the product content often, so new instance launched by the Auto Scaling group often have old data. It can take up to 30 minutes for the new instances to receive all the updates. The updates also requires the EBS volumes to be resized during business hours. The company wants to ensure that the product manuals are always up to data on all that the architecture adjusts quickly to increased user demand. A solutions architect needs to meet these requirements without causing the company to update its application code or adjust its website. What should the solution architect do to accomplish this goal?一家公司正在跨多个可用性区域使用弹性负载平衡器后面的Amazon ec2实例托管其网站.实例在EC2自动缩放组中运行.该网站使用Amazon Elastic Block Store(Amazon EBS)卷存储产品手册,供用户下载.公司经常更新产品内容,所以Auto Scaling group推出的新实例往往有旧数据.新实例接收所有更新最多需要30分钟.更新还要求在工作时间调整EBS卷的大小.该公司希望确保产品手册始终与所有架构上的数据保持一致,以快速调整架构以满足不断增长的用户需求.解决方案架构师需要满足这些要求,而不会导致公司更新其应用程序代码或调整其网站.解决方案架构师应该如何实现这个目标?

choices.A: Store the product manuals in an EBS volume. Mount that volume to the EC2 instances.->将产品手册存储在EBS卷中.将该卷装载到EC2实例.
choices.B: Store the product manuals in an Amazon S3 bucket. Redirect the downloads to this bucket.->将产品手册存储在Amazon s3存储桶中.将下载重定向到此存储桶.
choices.C: Store the product manual in an Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) volume. Mount that volume to the EC2 instances.->将产品手册存储在Amazon Elastic文件系统(Amazon EFS)卷中.将该卷装载到EC2实例.
choices.D: Store the product manual in an Amazon S3 Standard-infrequent Access (S3 Standard-IA) bucket. Redirect the downloads to this bucket.->将产品手册存储在Amazon S3 Standard Nofrequent Access(S3 Standard IA)存储桶中.将下载重定向到此存储桶.

body: A company recently launched Linux-based application instances on Amazon EC2 in a private subnet and launched a Linux-based bastion host on an Amazon EC2 instance in a public subnet of an VPC. A solution architect needs to connect from the on-premises network, through the company's internet connection, to the bastion host, and to the application servers. The solution architect must make sure that the security groups of all the EC2 instances will allow that access. Which combination of steps should the solutions architect take to meet these requirements? (select TWO)最近,一家公司在私有子网的Amazon ec2上启动了基于Linux的应用程序实例,并在VPC的公共子网的Amazon ec2实例上启动了基于Linux的bastion主机.解决方案架构师需要通过公司的互联网连接,从本地网络连接到堡垒主机和应用服务器.解决方案架构师必须确保所有EC2实例的安全组都允许这种访问.解决方案架构师应该采取哪些步骤来满足这些需求?(选择两个)

choices.A: Replace the current security group of the bastion host with one that only allows inbound access from the application instances.->将堡垒主机的当前安全组替换为只允许从应用程序实例进行入站访问的安全组.
choices.B: Replace the current security group of the bastion host with one that only allows inbound access from the internal IP range for the company.->将堡垒主机的当前安全组替换为只允许从公司的内部IP范围进行入站访问的安全组.
choices.C: Replace the current security group of the bastion host with one that only allows inbound access from the external IP range for the company->将堡垒主机的当前安全组替换为只允许从公司的外部IP范围进行入站访问的安全组
choices.D: Replace the current security group of the application instances with one that allows inbound SSH access from only the private IP address of the bastion host.->将应用程序实例的当前安全组替换为只允许从堡垒主机的专用IP地址进行入站SSH访问的安全组.

body: A company has an application that servers clients that are deployed in more than 20,000 retail storefront locations around the world. The application consists of backend web services that are exposed over HTTPS on port 443. The application is hosted on Amazon EC2 instance behind an Application Load balancer (ALB). The retail locations communicate with the web applications over the public internet. The company allows each retail location to register the IP address that the retail location has been allocated by its local ISP. The company's security team recommends to increase the security of the application endpoint by restricting access to only the IP addresses registered by the retail locations. What should a solutions architect do to meet these requirements?一家公司有一个应用程序,为部署在全球20000多家零售店面的客户机提供服务.该应用程序包含通过端口443上的HTTPS公开的后端web服务.应用程序托管在应用程序负载平衡器(ALB)后面的Amazon ec2实例上.零售点通过公共互联网与web应用程序进行通信.公司允许每个零售点注册其本地ISP分配的IP地址.该公司的安全团队建议通过限制对零售点注册的IP地址的访问来提高应用程序端点的安全性.解决方案架构师应该如何满足这些需求?

choices.A: Associate an AWS WAF web ACL with the ALB. Use IP rule sets on the ALB to filter traffic. Update the IP addresses in the rule to include the registered IP addresses.->将AWS WAF web ACL与ALB关联.使用ALB上的IP规则集过滤流量.更新规则中的IP地址以包括已注册的IP地址.
choices.B: Deploy AWS Firewall Manager to manage the ALB. Configure firewall rules to restrict traffic to the ALB. Modify the firewall rules to include the registered IP addresses.->部署AWS防火墙管理器来管理ALB.配置防火墙规则以限制ALB的通信量.修改防火墙规则以包括已注册的IP地址.
choices.C: Store the IP addresses in an Amazon DynamicDB table. Configure an AWS Lambda authorization function on the ALB to validate that incoming requests are from the registered IP addresses.->将IP地址存储在Amazon DynamicDB表中.在ALB上配置AWS Lambda授权函数,以验证传入的请求是否来自注册的IP地址.
choices.D: Configure the network ACL on the subnet that contains the public interface of the ALB. Update the ingress rules on the network ACL with entries for each of the registered IP addresses.->在包含ALB公共接口的子网上配置网络ACL.使用每个注册IP地址的条目更新网络ACL上的入口规则.

body: A company has many applications on Amazon EC2 instances running in Auto Scaling groups. Company policy requires that the data on the attached Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes be retained. Which action will meet these requirements without impacting performance?一家公司在Amazon ec2实例上有许多应用程序以自动伸缩组的形式运行.公司政策要求保留附加的Amazon Elastic Block Store(Amazon EBS)卷上的数据.哪项行动将在不影响性能的情况下满足这些要求?

choices.A: Enable termination protection on the Amazon EC2 instances.->在Amazon ec2实例上启用终止保护.
choices.B: Disable the DeleteOnTermination attribute for the Amazon EBS volumes.->禁用Amazon EBS卷的DeleteOnTermination属性.
choices.C: Use Amazon EC2 user data to set up a synchronization job for root volume.->使用Amazon ec2用户数据为根卷设置同步作业.
choices.D: Change the Auto scaling health check to point to a source on the root volume.->将自动缩放运行状况检查更改为指向根卷上的源.

body: A company observes an increase in Amazon EC2 costs in its most recent bill. The billing team notices unwanted vertical scaling of instance types for a couple of EC2 instances. A solutions architect needs to create a graph comparing the last 2 months of EC2 costs and perform an in-depth analysis to identity the root cause of the vertical scaling. How should the solutions architect generate the information with the LEAST operational overhead?一家公司在最近的账单中发现Amazon EC2的成本增加了.计费团队注意到一些EC2实例的实例类型的不必要的垂直扩展.解决方案架构师需要创建一个图表,比较过去2个月的EC2成本,并执行深入分析,以确定垂直扩展的根本原因.解决方案架构师应该如何以最小的操作开销生成信息?

choices.A: Use AWS Budgets to create a budget report and compare costs based on instance types.->使用AWS预算创建预算报告,并根据实例类型比较成本.
choices.B: Use Cost Explorer's granular filtering feature to perform an in-depth analysis of EC2 costs based on instance types.->使用costexplorer的细粒度过滤特性,根据实例类型对EC2成本进行深入分析.
choices.C: Use graphs from he AWS Billing and Cost Management dashboard to compare EC2 costs based on instance typ s for the least 2 months.->使用AWS计费和成本管理仪表板中的图表,根据实例类型比较至少2个月的EC2成本.
choices.D: Use AWS Cost and Usage Report to create a report and send it to an Amazon S3 bucket. Use Amazon QuickSight Amazon S3 as a source to generate an interactive graph based on instance types.->使用AWS Cost and Usage Report创建一个报告并将其发送到Amazon s3 bucket.使用Amazon quicksighAmazon s3作为源代码,根据实例类型生成交互式图形.

body: A company's cloud operations team wants to standardize resource remediation. The company wants to provide a standard set of governance evaluations and remediation's to all member accounts in its organization in AWS Organizations. Which self-managed AWS service can the company use to meet these requirements with the LEAST amount of operational effort?一家公司的云操作团队希望将资源补救标准化.该公司希望为AWS组织中其组织中的所有成员帐户提供一套标准的治理评估和补救措施.公司可以使用哪种自我管理的AWS服务以最少的操作工作量来满足这些要求?

choices.A: AWS Security Hub compliance standards->AWS安全中心合规标准
choices.B: AWS Config conformance packs->AWS配置一致性包
choices.C: AWS CloudTrail->AWS云径
choices.D: AWS Trusted Advisor->AWS可信顾问

body: A product manager of an ecommerce website is launching a new product line next month. The application hosting the website runs on Amazon EC2 instances in an Auto Scaling group behind a load balancer. Testing has been performed, and the maximum load at launch has been estimated. Traffic to the application is expected to decrease gradually within the first few weeks after the launch. This workload is the only one on this account that is expected to scale during launch. Which combination of steps is MOST cost-effective to ensure that will be dequate capacity when the application scales at launch? (Select TWO.)一家电子商务网站的产品经理下个月将推出一条新的产品线.托管该网站的应用程序在负载均衡器后面的自动伸缩组中的Amazon ec2实例上运行.已经进行了测试,估计了发射时的最大载荷.该应用程序的流量预计将在发布后的最初几周内逐渐减少.此工作负载是此帐户上唯一一个预计在启动期间扩展的工作负载.哪种步骤组合最具成本效益,以确保应用程序在启动时扩展时容量不足?(选择两个.)

choices.A: Purchase Reserved instance (RIs) with zonal scope to reserve capacity and get the discount to compute. Then cancel the Ris after the launch.->购买具有分区范围的预留实例(RIs)来预留容量,并获得折扣进行计算.然后在发射后取消Ris.
choices.B: Contact AWS to reserve hardware in the AWS Reg on that will be near the most users.->联系AWS在AWS注册中保留硬件,这将接近大多数用户.
choices.C: Check the EC2 service quotas on the account, and request an increase if the values are lower than the expected load at launch. ->检查帐户上的EC2服务配额,如果值低于启动时的预期负载,则请求增加.
choices.D: Purchase Scheduled instances to reserve capacity for the launch, and run them on a daily schedule during peak capacity hours.->购买计划的实例以为发布保留容量,并在容量高峰时段按每日计划运行它们.

choices.C: Interface VPC endpoint->VPC端点接口
