body: A company is planning to migrate 40 servers hosted on premises in VMware to the AWS Cloud. The migration process must be implemented with minimal downtime. The company also wants to test the servers before the cutover date. Which solution meets these requirements?一家公司计划将40台托管在VMware内部的服务器迁移到AWS云.迁移过程必须以最少的停机时间来实现.该公司还希望在切换日期之前测试服务器.哪种解决方案满足这些要求?

choices.A: Deploy the AWS DataSync agent into the on-premises environment. Use DataSync to migrate the servers.->将AWS DataSync代理部署到本地环境中.使用DataSync迁移服务器.
choices.B: Deploy an AWS Snowball device connected by way of RJ45 to the on-premises network. Use Snowball to migrate the servers.->部署一个通过RJ45连接到本地网络的AWS雪球设备.使用Snowball迁移服务器.
choices.C: Deploy an AWS Database Migration service (AWS DMS) replication instance into AWS. Use AWS DMS to migrate the servers.->将AWS数据库迁移服务(AWS DMS)复制实例部署到AWS中.使用AWS-DMS迁移服务器.
choices.D: Deploy the AWS Server Migration Service (AWS SMS) connector into the on-premises environment. Use AWS SMS to migrate the servers.->将AWS服务器迁移服务(AWS SMS)连接器部署到本地环境中.使用AWS SMS迁移服务器.

ans_desc: 关键自适要迁移服务器不是数据到AWS。迁移服务器应该是用Server Migration Service，DataSync应该是迁移数据不是迁移服务器

body: A company has a web application for travel ticketing. The application is based on a database that runs in a single data center in North America. The company wants to expand the application to serve a global user base. The company needs to display the application to multiple AWS Regions. Average latency must be less than 1 second on updates to reservation database. The company wants to have separate deployments of its web platform across multiple Regions. However, the company must maintain a single primary reservation database that is globally consistent. Which solution should a solutions architect recommend to meet these requirements?一家公司有一个旅游票务的网络应用程序.该应用程序基于一个在北美单个数据中心运行的数据库.该公司希望扩展应用程序以服务于全球用户群.公司需要向多个AWS区域显示应用程序.对保留数据库进行更新时,平均延迟必须小于1秒.该公司希望在多个地区分别部署其网络平台.但是,公司必须维护一个全局一致的主预订数据库.解决方案架构师应该推荐哪种解决方案来满足这些需求?

choices.A: Convert the application to use Amazon DynamoDB. Use a global table for the center reservation table. Use the correct Regional endpoint in each Regional deployment. ->将应用程序转换为使用Amazon dynamiodb.使用全局表作为中心保留表.在每个区域部署中使用正确的区域终结点.
choices.B: Migrate the database to an Amazon Aurora MySQL database. Deploy Aurora Read Replicas in each Region. Use the correct Region endpoint in each Regional deployment for access to the database.->将数据库迁移到Amazon Aurora MySQL数据库.在每个区域部署Aurora Read副本.在每个区域部署中使用正确的区域终结点来访问数据库.
choices.C: Migrate the database to an Amazon RDS for MySQL database. Deploy MySQL read replicas in each Region. Use the correct Regional endpoint In each Regional deployment for access to the database.->将数据库迁移到Amazon RDS for MySQL数据库.在每个区域部署MySQL读取副本.在每个区域部署中使用正确的区域终结点来访问数据库.
choices.D: Migrate the application to an Amazon Aurora Severless database. Deploy instances of the database to each Region. Use the correct Region endpoint in each Regional deployment to access the database. Use AWS Lambda functions to process event streams in each Region to synchronize the databases.->将应用程序迁移到Amazon Aurora Severless数据库.将数据库实例部署到每个区域.在每个区域部署中使用正确的区域终结点来访问数据库.使用AWS Lambda函数处理每个区域中的事件流以同步数据库.

body: A company is using Amazon CloudFront with its website. The company has enabled logging on the CloudFront distribution, and logs are saved in one of the company's Amazon S3 buckets. The company needs to perform advanced analysis on the logs and build visualizations. What should a solutions architect do to meet these requirements?一家公司在其网站上使用Amazon CloudFront.该公司已经启用了CloudFront发行版的日志记录,日志保存在该公司的Amazon s3存储桶中.公司需要对日志进行高级分析并构建可视化.解决方案架构师应该如何满足这些需求?

choices.A: Use standard SQL queries in Amazon Athena to analyze CloudFront logs in the S3 bucket. Visualize the results with AWS Glue.->使用Amazon athena中的标准SQL查询来分析S3 bucket中的CloudFront日志.用AWS胶水将结果可视化.
choices.B: Use standard SQL queries in Amazon Athena to analyze the CloudFront logs in the S3 bucket. Visual the results with Amazon QuickSight.->使用Amazon athena中的标准SQL查询来分析S3 bucket中的CloudFront日志.使用Amazon QuickSight查看结果.
choices.C: Use standard queries in Amazon DynamoDB to analyze the Cloudfront logs in the S3 bucket. Visualize the results with the AWS Glue.->使用Amazon dynamiodb中的标准查询来分析S3 bucket中的Cloudfront日志.用AWS胶水将结果可视化.
choices.D: Use standard SQL queries in Amazon DynamoDB to analyze the CloudFront logs in the S3 bucket. Visualize the results with Amazon QuickSight.->使用Amazon dynamiodb中的标准SQL查询来分析S3 bucket中的CloudFront日志.使用Amazon QuickSight可视化结果.

body: A company experienced a breach from an attacker on its on-premises network. The attacker launched port scanning, waged on outbound Dos attack, and performed crypto currency mining. The company is moving to AWS to build a more resilient architecture that monitors and remediate this type the attack on the account level. How should the company use AWS services to meet these requirements?一家公司的内部网络遭到攻击者的攻击.攻击者启动端口扫描,发起出站Dos攻击,并执行加密货币挖掘.该公司正在转向AWS,以构建一个更具弹性的体系结构,该体系结构可以在帐户级别监视和修复这种类型的攻击.公司应该如何使用AWS服务来满足这些要求?

choices.A: Enable Amazon GuardDuty to generate findings. Trigger AWS Lambda for automated remediation of identified threats.->启用Amazon GuardDuty生成结果.触发AWS Lambda以自动修复已识别的威胁.
choices.B: Enable AWS Config and configure policies to monitor against breaches. Trigger AWS Lambda for automated remediation of noncompliant resources->启用AWS配置和配置策略以监视违规行为.触发AWS Lambda以自动修复不合规资源
choices.C: Enable Amazon Macie to identify and classify security threats. Configure events in Amazon EventBridge (Amazon CloudWatch Events) to trigger actions based on the severity of threats.->使Amazon Macie能够识别和分类安全威胁.在Amazon EventBridge(Amazon CloudWatch事件)中配置事件,以根据威胁的严重性触发操作.
choices.D: Enable Amazon inspector to generate assessment reports. Configure events in Amazon EventBridge (Amazon CloudWatch Events) to trigger actions based on identified threat.->使Amazon inspector能够生成评估报告.在Amazon EventBridge(Amazon CloudWatch事件)中配置事件,以根据已识别的威胁触发操作.

body: A company is running a publicly accessible serverless application that uses Amazon API Gateway and AWS Lambda. The application's traffic recently spiked due to fraudulent requests from botnets. Which steps should a solutions architect take to block requests from unauthorized users? (Select TWO.)一家公司正在运行一个使用Amazon api网关和AWS Lambda的可公开访问的无服务器应用程序.由于僵尸网络的欺诈请求,应用程序的流量最近急剧上升.解决方案架构师应该采取哪些步骤来阻止来自未授权用户的请求?(选择两个.)

choices.A: Create a usage plan with an API key that is shared with genuine users only.->创建一个使用API密钥的使用计划,该密钥只与真正的用户共享.
choices.B: Integrate logic within the Lambda function to ignore the requests from fraudulent addresses.->在Lambda函数中集成逻辑以忽略来自欺诈地址的请求.
choices.C: Implement an AWS WAF rule to target malicious requests and trigger actions to filter them out.->实现一个AWS WAF规则来针对恶意请求并触发操作来过滤它们.
choices.D: Convert the existing public API to a private API. Update the DNS records to redirect users to the new API endpoint.->将现有的公共API转换为私有API.更新DNS记录以将用户重定向到新的API终结点.
choices.E: Create an IAM role for each user attempting to access the API. A user will assume the role when making the API call.->为尝试访问API的每个用户创建IAM角色.用户在进行API调用时将承担该角色.

body: A company has developed a database in Amazon RDS for MySQL. Due to increased support team is reporting slow reads against the DB instance and recommends adding a read replica. Which combination of actions should a solutions architect take before implementing this change? (Select TWO.)一家公司在Amazon RDS for MySQL中开发了一个数据库.由于增加了支持,团队报告对DB实例的读取速度较慢,建议添加读取副本.解决方案架构师在实现此更改之前应该采取哪些操作组合?(选择两个.)

choices.A: Enable binlog replication on the RDS master.->在RDS主机上启用binlog复制.
choices.B: Choose a failover priority for the source DB instance.->为源数据库实例选择故障转移优先级.
choices.C: Allow long-running transactions to complete on the source DB instance.->允许在源数据库实例上完成长时间运行的事务.
choices.D: Create a global table and specify the AWS Regions where the table will be available.->创建一个全局表并指定该表可用的AWS区域.
choices.E: Enable automatic backups on the source instance by settings the backup retention period to a value other than 0.->通过将备份保留期设置为0以外的值,在源实例上启用自动备份.

body: A company fails an AWS security reviews conducted by the third party. The review finds out that some of the company method to access the Amazon EMR through the public internet. Which combination of steps should the company take to MOST improve its security? (Select TWO.)一家公司未能通过第三方进行的AWS安全审查.审查发现,该公司的一些做法是通过公共互联网访问Amazon 电子病历.公司应该采取哪几种措施来提高安全性?(选择两个.)

choices.A: Set up a VPC peering connect to the Amazon EMR API.->设置一个VPC对等连接到Amazon EMR API.
choices.B: Set up VPC endpoints to connect to the Amazon EMR API.->设置VPC端点以连接到Amazon EMR API.
choices.C: Set up a NAT gateway to connect to the Amazon EMR API.->设置NAT网关以连接到Amazon EMR API.
choices.D: Set up IAM roles to be used to connect to the Amazon FMR API.->设置凌晨1点的角色,用于连接到Amazon fmrapi.
choices.E: Set up each developer with AWS Secrets Manager to store access keys.->为每个开发人员设置AWS Secrets Manager来存储访问密钥.

ans_desc:
Peering Connection: A peering connection enables you to route traffic via private IP addresses between two peered VPCs. VPC Endpoints: Enables private connectivity to services hosted in AWS, from within your VPC without using an Internet Gateway, VPN, Network Address Translation (NAT) devices, or firewall proxies.

对等连接：对等连接使您能够通过专用IP地址在两个对等VPC之间路由流量。 VPC端点：无需使用Internet网关，VPN，网络地址转换（NAT）设备或防火墙代理，即可从您的VPC内实现与AWS中托管的服务的私有连接。

body: A company's eb ite receives 50,000 requests each second. The company wants to use multiple applications to analyze the navigation patterns of the website users so that the experience can be personalized. Which AWS services or feature should a solutions architect use to collect page clicks for the website and process them sequentially for each user?公司的电子商务网站每秒收到50000个请求.该公司希望使用多个应用程序来分析网站用户的导航模式,以便体验个性化.解决方案架构师应该使用哪种AWS服务或功能来收集网站的页面点击并为每个用户依次处理它们?

choices.B: Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) standard queue->Amazon 简单队列服务(Amazon SQS)标准队列

body: A company is building a web application that servers a content management system. The content management system runs on Amazon EC2 instances behind an application Load Balancer (ALB). The EC2 instances run in an Auto Scaling group across Availability Zones. Users are constantly adding and updating files, blogs, and other website assets in the content management system. Which solution meets these requirements?一家公司正在构建一个服务于内容管理系统的web应用程序.内容管理系统在应用程序负载均衡器(ALB)后面的Amazon ec2实例上运行.EC2实例在跨可用性区域的自动伸缩组中运行.用户不断地在内容管理系统中添加和更新文件.博客和其他网站资产.哪种解决方案满足这些要求?

choices.A: Update the EC2 user data in the Auto Scaling group lifecycle policy to copy the website assets from the EC2 instance that was launched most recently. Configure the ALB to make changes to the websites assets only in the newest EC2 instance.->更新自动缩放组生命周期策略中的EC2用户数据,以从最近启动的EC2实例复制网站资产.将ALB配置为仅在最新的EC2实例中更改网站资产.
choices.B: Copy the website assets to an Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) Me system. Configure each EC2 instance to mount the EFS m system locally. Configure the website hosting application to reference the website assets that are stored in the EFS file system.->将网站资产复制到Amazon 弹性文件系统(Amazon EFS)Me系统.配置每个EC2实例以在本地挂载EFS m系统.配置网站托管应用程序以引用存储在EFS文件系统中的网站资产.
choices.C: Copy the website assets to an Amazon S3 bucket. Ensure that each EC2 instance downloads the website assets from the S3 bucket to the attached Amazon Basic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume. Run the S3 sync command once each hour to keep files up to date.->将网站资产复制到Amazon s3存储桶.确保每个EC2实例将网站资产从S3 bucket下载到附加的Amazon 基本块存储(Amazon EBS)卷.每小时运行一次S3 sync命令以保持文件最新.
choices.D: Restore an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) snapshot w.th the website assets. Attach the EBS snapshot as a secondary EBS volume when a new EBS EC2 instance is launched. Configure the website hosting application to reference the website assets that are stored in the secondary EBS volume.->使用网站资产还原Amazon Elastic Block Store(Amazon EBS)快照.在启动新的EBS EC2实例时,将EBS快照附加为辅助EBS卷.配置网站托管应用程序以引用存储在辅助EBS卷中的网站资产.

body: A company needs to connect several VPCs in the us-east Region that span hundreds of AWS accounts. The company's networking team as its own AWS account to manage the cloud network. What is the MOST operationally efficient solution to connect the VPCs?一家公司需要连接美国东部地区的几个VPC,这些VPC跨越数百个AWS帐户.该公司的网络团队作为自己的AWS账户来管理云网络.连接专有网络最有效的解决方案是什么?

choices.A: Set up VPC peering connections between each VPC. Update each associated subnet's route table.->在每个VPC之间建立VPC对等连接.更新每个关联子网的路由表.
choices.B: Configure a NAT gateway and an internal gateway in each VPC in connected each VPC through the internal.->在每个VPC中配置一个NAT网关和一个内部网关,通过内部网关连接每个VPC.
choices.C: Create an AWS Transit Gateway in the networking team's AWS account. Configure static routes from each VPC.->在网络团队的AWS帐户中创建AWS传输网关.从每个VPC配置静态路由.
choices.D: Deploy VPN gateway in each VPC. Configure create a transit VPC in the networking team's AWS account to connect to each VPC.->在每个专有网络中部署VPN网关.配置在网络团队的AWS帐户中创建一个传输专有网络,以连接到每个专有网络.

body: A company designed a stateless two-tier that uses Amazon EC2 in a single Availability Zone and an Amazon RDS multi-AZ DB instance. New company management wants to ensure the application is highly available. choices.A: Configure Amazon Route 53 to forward requests to an Application Load Balancer. Use AWS Lambda for the application in AWS Application Auto Scaling.->配置Amazon 路由53以将请求转发到应用程序负载平衡器.在AWS应用程序自动缩放中,对应用程序使用AWS Lambda.

body: A company manages a data lake in an Amazon S3 bucket that numerous application share. The S3 bucket contain unique folders with a prefix for each application. body: A company hosts multiple production applications. One of the applications consists of resources from Amazon EC2 AWS Lambda Amazon RDS Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS). body: An application team has started using Amazon EMR to run batch jobs using datasets located in Amazon S3. How can the learn optimize the cost of the workload?一个应用程序团队已经开始使用Amazon emr,使用Amazon s3中的数据集运行批处理作业.在工作负载的初始测试期间,解决方案架构师注意到该帐户开始累积NAT网关数据处理成本.学习如何优化工作量成本?

body: An image hosting company uploads its large assets to Amazon S3 Standard buckets. The company uses multipart upload in parallel by using S3 APIs and overwrites if the same object is uploaded again. For the first 30 days after upload the objects will be accessed frequently. The objects will be used less frequently after 30 days but the access patterns for each object will be inconsistent. The company must optimize its S3 storage costs while maintaining high availability and resiliency of stored assets. Which combination of actions should a solutions architect recommend lo meet these requirements? (Select TWO.)一家图像托管公司将其大量资产上传到Amazon s3标准存储桶.该公司使用s3api并行使用多部分上传,如果再次上传同一对象,则覆盖.在上传后的前30天内,对象将被频繁访问.这些对象在30天后使用频率会降低,但每个对象的访问模式将不一致.公司必须优化其S3存储成本,同时保持存储资产的高可用性和弹性.解决方案架构师应该推荐哪种操作组合来满足这些需求?(选择两个.)

choices.A: Move assets to S3 Intelligent-Tiering after 30 days->30天后将资产移动到S3智能分层
choices.B: Configure an S3 Lifecycle policy to clean up incomplete multipart uploads->配置S3生命周期策略以清除不完整的多部分上载
choices.C: Configure an S3 L fecycle policy to clean up expired object delete markers->配置S3 L fecycle策略以清除过期的对象删除标记
choices.D: Move ass ts to S3 Standard-Infrequent Access (S3 Standard-iA) after 30 days->30天后将ass ts移到S3标准不频繁访问(S3标准iA)
choices.E: Move ass ts to S3 One Zone infrequent Access (S3 One Zone-IA) after 30 days->30天后将ass ts移到S3一区不常进入(S3一区IA)

body: A company wants to deploy an additional Amazon Aurora MySQL DB cluster for development purposes. choices.A: Purchas a Reserved Instance for the DB instances.->为DB实例购买保留实例.

body: A development team is creating an event-based application that uses AWS Lambda functions. Events will be generated when files are added to an Amazon S3 bucket. The development team currently has Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) configured as the event target from Amazon S3. What should a solution architect do to process the events from Amazon S3 in a scalable why?一个开发团队正在创建一个使用AWS Lambda函数的基于事件的应用程序.将文件添加到Amazon s3存储桶时将生成事件.开发团队目前将Amazon simplenotification服务(Amazon sns)配置为Amazon s3的事件目标.解决方案架构师应该如何以可伸缩的方式处理来自Amazon s3的事件?为什么?

choices.A: Create an SNS subscription that processes the event in Amazon Elastic Container Service (Amazon ECS) before the event runs in Lambda.->创建一个SNS订阅,在Amazon 弹性容器服务(Amazon ECS)中处理事件,然后事件在Lambda中运行.
choices.B: Create an SNS subscription that processes the event in Amazon Elastic Kubermetes Service (Amazon EKS) before the event runs in Lambda.->创建一个SNS订阅,在Amazon 弹性Kubermetes服务(Amazon EKS)中处理事件,然后事件在Lambda中运行.
choices.C: Create on SNS subscription that sends the event to AWS Server Migration Service (AWS SQS). Configure the SQS queue to trigger a Lambda function.->创建向AWS服务器迁移服务(AWS SQS)发送事件的SNS订阅.配置SQS队列以触发Lambda函数.
choices.D: Create an SNS subscription that sends the event to AWS Server Migration Service (AWS SMS). Configure the Lambda function to poll from the SMS event->创建将事件发送到AWS服务器迁移服务(AWS SMS)的SNS订阅.将Lambda函数配置为从SMS事件轮询

body: A company requires operating sys em permission on a relational database server. What should a solutions architect suggest as a configuration for a highly available database architecture?公司需要对关系数据库服务器具有操作系统em权限.解决方案架构师应该为高可用数据库体系结构建议什么配置?

body: A company runs a photo processing application that needs to frequently upload and download pictures from Amazon S3 buckets that are located in the same AWS Region. How can the solutions architect meet this requirement?一家公司运行一个图片处理应用程序,需要经常从位于同一AWS地区的Amazon S3存储桶上传和下载图片.解决方案架构师已经注意到数据传输费用的增加,需要实施一个解决方案来降低这些成本.解决方案架构师如何满足这一需求?

choices.A: Deploy Amazon API Gateway into a public subnet and adjust the oute table to route S3 calls through It.->将Amazon api网关部署到公共子网中,并调整oute表以通过它路由S3调用.

choices.C: Deploy the application Into a public subnet and allow it to route through an internet gateway to access the S3 Buckets->将应用程序部署到公共子网,并允许它通过internet网关路由以访问S3存储桶
choices.D: Deploy an S3 VPC gateway endpoint into the VPC and attach an endpoint policy that allows access to the S3 buckets.->将S3 VPC网关终结点部署到VPC中,并附加允许访问S3存储桶的终结点策略.

body: A company wants to run workload-Intensive queries from its 10 TB Amazon Aurora MySQL DB cluster. Temporary schema changes need to be made to the database to generate monthly reports. choices.C: Use Amazon RDS with a single Availability Zone option and schedule periodic database snapshots.->使用带有单个可用区域选项的Amazon rds,并计划定期的数据库快照.

body: A company wants to educe Its Amazon S3 storage costs in its production environment without impacting durability or performance of the stored objects. choices.A: Enable Amazon Made on the business-critical S3 buckets lo classify the sensitivity of the objects->启用Amazon 上的业务关键型S3 bucket来分类对象的敏感性

body: A company wants to improve the availability of an existing firewall. To meet the compliance requirements of the applications hosted in the VPC. The company's security team is using a proprietary firewall running on Amazon EC2 instances. All internet traffic flows through the primary firewall. When the primary firewall goes down, the team manually changes the VPC route table so that it uses a secondary firewall running in a different Availability Zone. Which strategies should a solutions architect use to improve the availability of the firewall? (Select TWO.)一家公司想提高现有防火墙的可用性.满足专有网络承载的应用的法规遵从性要求.该公司的安全团队正在使用运行在Amazon ec2实例上的专有防火墙.所有互联网流量都通过主防火墙.当主防火墙关闭时,团队手动更改VPC路由表,以便使用在不同可用性区域中运行的辅助防火墙.解决方案架构师应该使用哪些策略来提高防火墙的可用性?(选择两个.)

choices.A: Create an EC2 gateway endpoint In the VPC where the firewall is hosted.->在承载防火墙的VPC中创建EC2网关终结点.
choices.B: Create an EC2 interface endpoint in the VPC where the firewall is hosted.->在承载防火墙的VPC中创建EC2接口终结点.
choices.C: Enable enhanced networking on the EC2 instance running the proprietary firewall->在运行专有防火墙的EC2实例上启用增强的网络

body: A solutions architect is moving the static content from a public website hosted on Amazon EC2 instances to an Amazon S3 bucket. An Amazon CloudFront distribution will be used to deliver the static assets. The security group used by the EC2 instances restricts access to a limited set of IP ranges. Access to the static content should be similarly restricted. Which combination of steps will meet these requirements? (Select TWO.)解决方案架构师正在将静态内容从托管在Amazon ec2实例上的公共网站移动到Amazon s3存储桶中.Amazon CloudFront发行版将用于交付静态资产.EC2实例使用的安全组限制对一组有限的IP范围的访问.对静态内容的访问也应该受到类似的限制.哪些步骤组合将满足这些要求?(选择两个.)

choices.A: Create an origin access identity (OAI and associate it with the distribution. Change the permissions in the bucket policy so that only the OAI can read the objects.->创建源访问标识(OAI)并将其与分发相关联.更改bucket策略中的权限,以便只有OAI可以读取对象.
choices.B: Create an AWS WAF web ACL that ncludes the same IP restrictions that exist in the EC2 security group. Associate this new web AC with the CloudFront distribution.->创建AWS WAF web ACL,该ACL包含EC2安全组中存在的相同IP限制.将此新web AC与CloudFront发行版相关联.
choices.C: Create a new security group that includes the same IP restrictions that exist in the current EC2 security group. Associate this new security group with the CloudFront distribution.->创建一个新的安全组,其中包含与当前EC2安全组中存在的IP限制相同的IP限制.将此新安全组与CloudFront发行版相关联.
choices.D: Create a new security group that includes the same IP restrictions that exist in the current EC2 security group. Associate this new security group with the S3 bucket hosting the static content.->创建一个新的安全组,其中包含与当前EC2安全组中存在的IP限制相同的IP限制.将这个新的安全组与承载静态内容的S3 bucket相关联.
choices.E: Create a new IAM role and associate the role with the distribution. Change the permissions either on the S3 bucket or on the files within the S3 bucket so that only the newly created IAM role has read and download permissions. ->创建新的IAM角色并将该角色与分发相关联.更改S3 bucket或S3 bucket中文件的权限,以便只有新创建的IAM角色具有读取和下载权限.

body: A company needs guaranteed Amazon EC2 capacity in three specific Availability Zones in a specific AWS Region for an upcoming event that will last 1 week. What should the company do to guarantee the EC2 capacity?一家公司需要保证Amazon ec2在特定AWS区域的三个特定可用性区域的容量,以应对将持续1周的活动.公司应该如何保证EC2的产能?

choices.A: Purchase Reserved Instances that specify the Region needed.->购买指定所需区域的保留实例.
choices.B: Create an On-Demand Capacity Reservation that specifies the Region needed.->创建按需容量保留,指定所需的区域.
choices.C: Purchase Reserved Instances that specify the Region and three Availability Zones needed.->购买指定所需区域和三个可用性区域的保留实例.
choices.D: Create an On-Demand Capacity Reservation that specifies the Region and three Availability Zones needed.->创建按需容量保留,指定所需的区域和三个可用性区域.

body: A company sells ringtones created from clips of popular songs. The files containing the ringtones are stored in Amazon S3 Standard and are at least 123 KB m size. The company has millions of files but downloads are infrequent for ringtones older than 90 days. The company needs to save money on storage while keeping the most accessed files readily available for its users. Which action should the company take to meet hese requirements MOST cost-effectively? 一家公司销售从流行歌曲剪辑中创建的铃声. 包含铃声的文件存储在Amazon S3 Standard中,并且大小至少为123 KB m. 该公司拥有数百万个文件,但对于90天以上的铃声,很少下载. 该公司需要节省存储空间,同时又要使用户可以随时访问最多的文件. 公司应采取哪些措施来最经济地满足这些要求?

body: A company's website handles millions of requests each day. and the number of requests continues to increase. A solutions architect needs to improve the response time of the web application. choices.C: Create a new IAM role with SQS permissions. The update the task definition to use this role for the task role setting.->创建一个具有SQS权限的新IAM角色.更新任务定义以将此角色用于任务角色设置.

body: 53 latency-based routing to route requests to its UDP-based application tor users around the world the application is hosted on redundant servers in the company's on-premises data centers in the United States Asia, and Europe The company's compliance requirements state that the application must be hosted on premises. The company wants to improve the performance and availability of the application. What should a solutions architect do to meet these requirements? 53基于延迟的路由将请求路由至基于UDP的应用程序，以遍及全球的用户；该应用程序托管在公司在美国，亚洲和欧洲的本地数据中心中的冗余服务器上.公司的合规性要求指出:该应用程序必须在本地托管.该公司希望提高应用程序的性能和可用性.解决方案架构师应该怎么做才能满足这些要求？

choices.A: Configure throe Network Load Balancers (NLBs) in the three AWS Regions to address the on-premises endpoints. Create an accelerator by using AWS Global Accelerator, and register the NLBs as its endpoints. Provide access to the application by using a CNAML that points to the accelerator DNS.->在三个AWS区域中配置网络负载平衡器（NLB），以解决内部部署终端节点.使用AWS Global Accelerator创建加速器，并将NLB注册为其端点.通过使用指向加速器DNS的CNAML提供对应用程序的访问.
choices.B: Configure three Application Load Balancers (ALGs) in the three AWS Regions to wireless the on-premises endpoints. Create an accelerator by using AWS Global Accelerator, and register the ALBs as its endpoints. Provide access to the application by using a CNAK1L that points to the accelerator UNS->在三个AWS区域中配置三个应用程序负载平衡器（ALG），以无线方式部署内部部署终端节点.使用AWS Global Accelerator创建加速器，并将ALB注册为其端点.通过使用指向加速器UNS的CNAK1L提供对应用程序的访问
choices.C: Configure three Network Load Balancers (NLOs) in the three AWS Regions to address the on-prernises endpoints in Route 53. Create latency-based record that points to the three NLBs. and use it as an origin for an Amazon CloudFront distribution. Provide access to the application by using a CNAML that points to the CloudFront DNS.->在三个AWS区域中配置三个网络负载平衡器（NLO），以解决Route 53中的接入点终端.创建指向三个NLB的基于延迟的记录.并将其用作Amazon CloudFront分配的来源.通过使用指向CloudFront DNS的CNAML提供对应用程序的访问.
choices.D: Configure three Application Load Balancers (ALBs) in the three AWS Regions to address the on premises endpoint. in Route 53. Create a latency based record that points to the three ALUs and use it as an origin for an Amazon CloudFront distribution. Provide access to the application by using a CNAMF that points to the CloudFront DNS.->在三个AWS区域中配置三个应用程序负载平衡器（ALB），以解决本地终端节点.在Route 53中.创建一个基于延迟的记录，该记录指向三个ALU，并将其用作Amazon CloudFront分配的来源.通过使用指向CloudFront DNS的CNAMF提供对应用程序的访问.

body: A company wants to launch a new application using Amazon Route 53, an Application Load Balancer (ALB), and an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group. The company is preparing to perform user experience testing and has a limited budget for this phase of the project. Although the company plans to do a load test in the future, it wants to prevent users from load testing at this time because it wants to limit unnecessary EC2 automatic scaling. What should a solutions architect do to minimize costs of the user experience testing?一家公司希望使用Amazon Route 53，应用程序负载平衡器（ALB）和Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling组启动新应用程序.该公司正在准备进行用户体验测试，并且在该项目的此阶段预算有限.尽管该公司计划将来进行负载测试，但由于希望限制不必要的EC2自动缩放，因此希望此时阻止用户进行负载测试.解决方案架构师应该怎么做才能最大程度地降低用户体验测试的成本？

choices.A: Configure AWS Shield's client request threshold to 100 connections per client.->将AWS Shield的客户端请求阈值配置为每个客户端100个连接.
choices.B: Deploy AWS WAF on the ALB with a rate-based rule configured to limit the number of requests each client can make.->使用基于速率的规则配置在ALB上部署AWS WAF，以限制每个客户端可以发出的请求数.
choices.C: Configure the ALB with an advanced request routing policy to throttle the client connections being sent to the Auto Scaling group.->使用高级请求路由策略配置ALB，以限制正在发送到Auto Scaling组的客户端连接.
choices.D: Deploy Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) between the ALB and Auto Scaling group to queue client requests and change the Auto Scaling group maximum size to one.->在ALB和Auto Scaling组之间部署Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS），以将客户端请求排队，并将Auto Scaling组的最大大小更改为1.

body: An application launched on Amazon EC2 instances needs to publish personally identifiable information (PH) about customers using Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS). The application is launched in private subnets within an Amazon VPC. What is the MOST secure way to allow the application to access service endpoints in the same AWS Region?在Amazon EC2实例上启动的应用程序需要使用Amazon Simple Notification Service（Amazon SNS）发布有关客户的个人身份信息（PH）.该应用程序在Amazon VPC内的专用子网中启动.允许应用程序访问同一AWS区域中的服务端点的最安全的方法是什么？

choices.A: Use an internet gateway->使用网际网路闸道
choices.B: Use AWS PrivateLink->使用AWS PrivateLink
choices.C: Use a NAT gateway.->使用NAT网关.
choices.D: Use a proxy instance->使用代理实例

body: A company fails an AWS security review conducted by a third party. The review finds that some of the company's methods to access the Amazon EMR API are not secure. Developers are using AWS Cloud9, and access keys are connecting to the Amazon EMR API through the public internet. Which combination of steps should the company take to MOST improve its security? (Select TWO)一家公司未通过第三方进行的AWS安全审查.该审查发现该公司访问Amazon EMR API的某些方法不安全.开发人员正在使用AWS Cloud9，并且访问密钥通过公共互联网连接到Amazon EMR API.公司应采取哪些步骤来提高安全性，以提高其安全性？ （选择两个）

choices.A: Set up a VPC peering connection to the Amazon EMR API->设置与Amazon EMR API的VPC对等连接
choices.B: Set up VPC endpoints to connect to the Amazon EMR API->设置VPC终端节点以连接到Amazon EMR API
choices.C: Set up a NAT gateway to connect to the Amazon EMR API.->设置NAT网关以连接到Amazon EMR API.
choices.D: Set up IAM roles to be used to connect to the Amazon EMR API->设置要用于连接到Amazon EMR API的IAM角色
choices.E: Set up each developer with AWS Secrets Manager to store access keys->使用AWS Secrets Manager设置每个开发人员以存储访问密钥

body: A company is rolling out a new web service, but is unsure how many customers the service will attract. However, the company is unwilling to accept any downtime. What could a solutions architect recommend to the company to keep?一家公司正在推出一项新的Web服务，但不确定该服务将吸引多少客户.但是，该公司不愿接受任何停机时间.解决方案架构师可以向公司推荐什么？

choices.A: Amazon EC2
choices.B: Amazon RDS
choices.C: AWS CtoudTrail
choices.D: Amazon DynamoDB

body: A restaurant reservation application needs to access a waiting list. When a customer tries to reserve a table, and none are available, the customer application will put the user on the waiting list, and the application will notify the customer when a table becomes free. The waiting list must preserve the order in which customers were added to the waiting list. Which service should the solutions architect recommend to store this waiting list?饭店预订应用程序需要访问等待列表.当客户尝试保留表而没有可用的表时，客户应用程序会将用户置于等待列表中，并且当表空闲时，应用程序将通知客户.等待列表必须保留将客户添加到等待列表的顺序.解决方案架构师应建议使用哪种服务来存储此等待列表？

choices.A: Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS)->Amazon 简单通知服务（Amazon SNS）
choices.B: AWS Step Functions invoking AWS Lambda functions->调用AWS Lambda函数的AWS Step Functions
choices.C: A FIFO queue in Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS)->Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）中的FIFO队列
choices.D: A standard queue in Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS)->Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）中的标准队列

body: A solutions architect is designing an architecture that includes web application and database tiers. The web tier must be capable of auto scaling. The solutions architect has decided to separate each tier into its own subnets. The design includes two public subnets and four private subnets. The security team requires that tiers be able to communicate with each other only when there is a business need and that all other network traffic be blocked. What should the solutions architect do to meet these requirements?解决方案架构师正在设计一种包含Web应用程序和数据库层的体系结构. Web层必须能够自动缩放.解决方案架构师已决定将每个层分成自己的子网.该设计包括两个公用子网和四个专用子网.安全团队要求各层仅在有业务需要时才可以相互通信，并且必须阻止所有其他网络流量.解决方案架构师应怎么做才能满足这些要求？

choices.A: Create an Amazon GuardDuty source'destmation rule set to control communication->创建Amazon GuardDuty源的目的地规则集以控制通信
choices.B: Create one security group for all tiers to limit traffic to only the required source and destinations->为所有层创建一个安全组，以将流量限制为仅所需的源和目标
choices.C: Create specific security groups for each tier to limit traffic to only the required source and destinations->为每个层创建特定的安全组以将流量限制为仅所需的源和目标
choices.D: Create network ACLs in all six subnets to limit traffic to the sources and destinations required for the application to function->在所有六个子网中创建网络ACL，以将流量限制到应用程序正常运行所需的源和目标

body: A company has hired a solutions architect to design a reliable architecture for its application. The application consists of one Amazon RDS DB instance and two manually provisioned Amazon EC2 instances that run web servers. The EC2 instances are located in a single Availability Zone. An employee recently deleted the DB instance and the application was unavailable for 24 hours as a result. The company is concerned with the overall reliability of its environment. What should the solutions architect do to maximize reliability of the application's infrastructure?一家公司雇用了一名解决方案架构师来为其应用程序设计可靠的体系结构.该应用程序由一个Amazon RDS数据库实例和两个运行Web服务器的手动配置的Amazon EC2实例组成. EC2实例位于单个可用区中.一名员工最近删除了该数据库实例，结果该应用程序在24小时内不可用.该公司关注其环境的整体可靠性.解决方案架构师应该怎么做才能最大程度地提高应用程序基础架构的可靠性？

choices.A: Delete one EC2 instance and enable termination protection on the other EC2 instance. Update the DB instance to be Muto-AZ and enable deletion protection->删除一个EC2实例，并在另一个EC2实例上启用终止保护.将数据库实例更新为Muto-AZ并启用删除保护
choices.B: Update the DB instance to be Multiple-AZ and enable deletion protection. Place the EC2 instances behind an Application Load Balancer and run them in an EC2 Auto Seating group across multiple Availability Zones->将数据库实例更新为多可用区并启用删除保护.将EC2实例放置在Application Load Balancer后面，并在多个可用区中的EC2 Auto Seating组中运行它们
choices.C: Create an additional DB instance along with an Amazon API Gateway and an AWS Lambda function. Configure the application to invoke the Lambda function through API Gateway. Have the Lambda function write the data to the two DB instances->创建一个附加的数据库实例以及一个Amazon API Gateway和一个AWS Lambda函数.配置应用程序以通过API网关调用Lambda函数.让Lambda函数将数据写入两个数据库实例
choices.D: Place the EC2 instances in an EC2 Auto Scaling group that has multiple subnets located in multiple Availability Zones. Use Spot Instances instead of On-Demand instances. Set up Amazon CloudWatch alarms to monitor the health of the instances. Update the DB instance to be Multi-AZ and enable deletion protection->将EC2实例放入一个EC2 Auto Scaling组中，该组具有位于多个可用区中的多个子网.使用竞价型实例，而不是按需实例.设置Amazon CloudWatch警报以监视实例的运行状况.将数据库实例更新为多可用区并启用删除保护

A company is planning to make a series of schema changes to tables on its Amazon Aurora DB cluster. A solutions architect needs to test the changes in the most cost-effective manner possible. What should the solutions architect do to meet these requirements?一家公司计划对其Amazon Aurora数据库集群上的表进行一系列架构更改.解决方案架构师需要以最具成本效益的方式测试更改.解决方案架构师应怎么做才能满足这些要求？

choices.A: Create a clone of the current Aurora DB cluster. Perform the schema changes on the clone. Once the changes are tested and performance is acceptable, apply the same changes on the original cluster. Delete the clone.->创建当前Aurora数据库集群的克隆.在克隆上执行架构更改.一旦测试了更改并且性能可接受，就对原始群集应用相同的更改.删除克隆.
choices.B: Create an Amazon RDS for MySQL replica. Perform the schema changes on the replica. Once the changes are tested and performance is acceptable, apply the same changes on the replica. Once the changes are tested and performance is acceptable, apply the same changes on the primary DB instance. Delete the replica.->为MySQL副本创建Amazon RDS.在副本上执行架构更改.一旦测试了更改并且性能可接受，就对副本应用相同的更改.一旦测试了更改并且性能可接受，就对主数据库实例应用相同的更改.删除副本.
choices.C: Create an additional Aurora Replica Perform the schema changes on the Aurora Replica. Once the changes are tested and performance is acceptable, apply the same changes on the primary DB instance. Delete the Aurora Replica.->创建一个额外的Aurora副本在Aurora副本上执行架构更改.一旦测试了更改并且性能可接受，就对主数据库实例应用相同的更改.删除Aurora副本.
choices.D: Take a snapshot of the current Aurora DB cluster. Restore the snapshot of the cluster to a new cluster. Perform the schema changes on the restored cluster. Once the changes are tested and performance is acceptable, apply the same changes on the origin cluster. Delete the restored cluster.->拍摄当前Aurora数据库集群的快照.将群集的快照还原到新的群集.在还原的群集上执行架构更改.一旦测试了更改并且性能可接受，就对原始群集应用相同的更改.删除还原的群集.

body: An ecommerce application places orders in an Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue. When a message is received, the Amazon EC2 worker instances process the request The EC2 instancesare in an Auto Scaling group 236. How should the architecture be designed to scale the auto scaling group with the LEAST amount of operational overhead?电子商务应用程序将订单放置在Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）队列中.收到消息后，Amazon EC2辅助实例将处理该请求.EC2实例位于Auto Scaling组236中.该架构应如何设计为以最少的运营开销来扩展Auto Scaling组？

choices.A: Use an Amazon CloudWatch alarm on the EC2 CPU to scale the Auto Scaling group up and down->在EC2 CPU上使用Amazon CloudWatch警报来向上和向下扩展Auto Scaling组
choices.B: Use an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling health check for messages processed on the EC2 instances to scale up or down.->对Amazon EC2实例上处理的消息使用Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling运行状况检查以按比例放大或缩小.
choices.C: Use an Amazon CloudWatch alarm based on the number of messages in the queue to scale the Auto Scaling group up or down->根据队列中的消息数使用Amazon CloudWatch警报来向上或向下扩展Auto Scaling组
choices.D: Use an Amazon CloudWatch alarm based on the CPU to scale the Auto Scaling group up or down->使用基于CPU的Amazon CloudWatch警报来放大或缩小Auto Scaling组

body: A solutions architect is using an AWS Cloud Formation template to deploy a three-tier web application. The web application consists of a web tier and an application tier that stores and retrieves user data in Amazon DynamoDB tables. The web and application tiers are hosted on Amazon EC2 instances, and the database tier is not publicly accessible. The application EC2 instances need to access the DynamoDB tables without exposing API credentials in the template. What should the solutions architect do to meet these requirements?解决方案架构师正在使用AWS云形成模板来部署三层Web应用程序. Web应用程序由Web层和存储和检索Amazon DynamoDB表中的用户数据的应用程序层组成. Web和应用程序层托管在Amazon EC2实例上，并且数据库层不可公开访问.应用程序EC2实例需要访问DynamoDB表，而无需在模板中暴露API凭据.解决方案架构师应怎么做才能满足这些要求？

choices.A: Create an IAM role to read the DynamoOB tables. Associate the role with the application instances by reference an instance profile->创建一个IAM角色以读取DynamoOB表.通过引用实例配置文件将角色与应用程序实例相关联
choices.B: Create an IAM role that has the required permissions to read and write from the DynamoOB tables. Add the role to the EC2 instance profile and associate the instance profile with the apphcanon instances->创建一个IAM角色，该角色具有从DynamoOB表读取和写入所需的权限.将角色添加到EC2实例配置文件中，并将该实例配置文件与apphcanon实例相关联
choices.C: Use the parameter section in the AWS CkHidFormaton template to have the user input access and secret keys from an already-created IAM user mat has the required permissions to read and write from the DynamoOB tables->使用AWS CkHidFormaton模板中的parameter部分使用户输入访问权限，并且已创建的IAM用户垫中的密钥具有从DynamoOB表读取和写入所需的权限
choices.D: Create an IAM user m the AWS CioudFormation template that has the required permissions to read and write from the DynamoOB tables. Use the GetAti function to retrieve the access and secret keys and pass them to the application instances through the user data->在AWS CioudFormation模板中创建一个IAM用户，该模板具有读写DynamoOB表所需的权限.使用GetAti函数检索访问密钥和秘密密钥，并将它们通过用户数据传递给应用程序实例

body: A company has an application that scans millions of connected devices for security threats and pushes the scan logs to an Amazon S3 bucket. A total of 70 GB of data is generated each week, and the company needs to store 3 years of data for historical reporting. The company must process, aggregate, and enrich the data from Amazon S3 by performing complex analytical queries and joins in the least amount of time. The aggregated dataset is visualized on an Amazon QuickSight dashboard. What should a solutions architect recommend to meet these requirements?一家公司拥有一个应用程序，该应用程序扫描数百万个已连接的设备以??查找安全威胁，并将扫描日志推送到Amazon S3存储桶.每周总共产生70 GB的数据，该公司需要存储3年的数据以进行历史报告.该公司必须通过执行复杂的分析查询并在最短的时间内加入来处理，聚集和丰富来自Amazon S3的数据.聚合的数据集在Amazon QuickSight仪表板上可视化.解决方案架构师应建议什么来满足这些要求？

choices.A: Create and run an ETL job in AWS Glue to process the data from Amazon S3 and load it into Amazon Redshift. Perform the aggregation queries on Amazon Redshift.->在AWS Glue中创建并运行ETL作业以处理来自Amazon S3的数据并将其加载到Amazon Redshift中.在Amazon Redshift上执行聚合查询.
choices.B: Use AWS Lambda functions based on S3 PutObject event triggers to copy the incremental changes to Amazon DynamoDB. Perform the aggregation queries on DynamoDB.->使用基于S3 PutObject事件触发器的AWS Lambda函数将增量更改复制到Amazon DynamoDB.在DynamoDB上执行聚合查询.
choices.C: Use AWS Lambda functions based on S3 PutObject event triggers to copy the incremental changes to Amazon Aurora MySQL. Perform the aggregation queries on Aurora MySQL->使用基于S3 PutObject事件触发器的AWS Lambda函数将增量更改复制到Amazon Aurora MySQL.在Aurora MySQL上执行聚合查询
choices.D: Use AWS Glue to catalog the data in Amazon S3. Perform the aggregation queries on the cataloged tables by using Amazon Athena. Query the data directly from Amazon S3.->使用AWS Glue在Amazon S3中分类数据.使用Amazon Athena对分类表执行聚合查询.直接从Amazon S3查询数据.

body: A company is using various types of Amazon EC2 On-Demand Instances. The company suspects that these instances have greater CPU and memory capacity than its workloads require. Which actions should the company take to obtain recommendations to optimize cost? (Select TWO.)一家公司正在使用各种类型的Amazon EC2按需实例.该公司怀疑这些实例具有比其工作负载所需的更大的CPU和内存容量.公司应采取哪些行动来获得优化成本的建议？ （选择两个.）

choices.A: Use AWS Trusted Advisor for instance type recommendations->将AWS Trusted Advisor用于实例类型建议
choices.B: Use AWS Compute Optimizer for instance type recommendations->将AWS Compute Optimizer用于实例类型建议
choices.C: Use AWS Budgets for instance type recommendations->使用AWS Budgets作为实例类型建议
choices.D: Use Cost Explorer right sizing recommendations->使用Cost Explorer正确调整大小的建议
choices.E: Use Amazon Inspector to identify under utilized EC2 instances.->使用Amazon Inspector识别使用不足的EC2实例.

body: A company receives data from different sources and implements multiple applications to consume this data. There are many short-running jobs that run only on the weekend. The data arrives in batches rather than throughout the entire weekend. The company needs an environment on AWS to ingest and process this data while maintaining the order of the transactions. Which combination of AWS services meets these requirements in the MOST cost-effective manner?一家公司从不同来源接收数据，并实施多个应用程序来使用此数据.有许多短期工作仅在周末运行.数据分批到达，而不是整个周末.该公司需要在AWS上使用一个环境来摄取和处理此数据，同时保持交易的顺序.哪种AWS服务组合以最经济有效的方式满足了这些要求？

choices.A: Amazon Kinesis Data Streams with AWS Lambda->使用AWS Lambda的Amazon Kinesis数据流
choices.B: Amazon Kinesis Data Streams with Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling->具有Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling的Amazon Kinesis数据流
choices.C: Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) with AWS Lambda->使用AWS Lambda的Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）
choices.D: Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) with Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling->具有Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling的Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）

body: A global company plans to track and store information about local allergens in an Amazon DynamoOB table and query this data from its website. The company anticipates that website traffic will fluctuate. The company estimates that the combined read and write capacity units will range from 10 10.000 per second, depending on the severity of the conditions for the given day. A solutions architect must design a solution that avoids throttling issues and manages capacity efficiently. What should the solutions architect do to meet these requirements MOST cost-effectively?一家全球公司计划在Amazon DynamoOB表中跟踪和存储有关本地过敏原的信息，并从其网站查询此数据.该公司预计网站流量会有所波动.该公司估计，组合的读写容量单位将在每秒10 10.000的范围内，具体取决于给定日期的状况的严重性.解决方案架构师必须设计一种避免节流问题并有效管理容量的解决方案.解决方案架构师应该怎么做才能以最低的成本来满足这些要求？

choices.A: Use provisioned capacity mode. Set the table's read capacity units to 10,000.->使用预配置容量模式.将表的读取容量单位设置为10,000.
choices.B: Use provisioned capacity mode and a scaling policy in DynamoDB auto scaling->在DynamoDB自动扩展中使用预配置的容量模式和扩展策略
choices.C: Use on demand capacity made for a couple of months. Then switch to provisioned capacity mode->按需使用了几个月的能力.然后切换到预配置容量模式
choices.D: Use on-demand capacity mode only. Configure DynamoDB Accelerator (DAX) to be in front of the tab->仅使用按需容量模式.将DynamoDB Accelerator（DAX）配置在选项卡的前面

body: A company is using various types of amazon EC-2 On-Demand instances. The company suspects that these instances have greater cpu and memory capacity than its workloads require. Which actions should the company take to obtain recommendation to optimize cost?（select two）一家公司正在使用各种类型的Amazon EC-2 On-Demand实例.该公司怀疑这些实例的cpu和内存容量比其工作负载所需的容量更大.公司应采取哪些行动来获得优化成本的建议？ 选择2个

choices.A: Use AWS Trusted Advisor for instance type recommendations.->将AWS Trusted Advisor用于实例类型建议.
choices.B: Use AWS Compute Optimizer for instance type recommendations.->将AWS Compute Optimizer用于实例类型建议.
choices.C: Use AWS Budgets for instance type recommendations.->使用AWS Budgets作为实例类型建议.
choices.D: Use Cost Explorer rightsizing recommendations.->使用Cost Explorer调整建议.
choices.E: Use Amazon Inspector to identify underutilized EC2 instances.->使用Amazon Inspector识别未充分利用的EC2实例.

body: A company has an AWS Direct Connect connection from its corporate data center to its VPC in the useast-1 Region. The company recently acquired a corporation that has several VPCs and a Direct Connect connection between its on-premises data center and the eu-west-2 Region. The CIDR blocks for the VPCs of the company and the corporation do not overlap. The company requires connectivity between two Regions and the data centers. The company needs a solution that is scalable while reducing operational overhead. What should a solutions architect do to meet these requirements?公司的公司数据中心与useast-1地区中的VPC建立了AWS Direct Connect连接.该公司最近收购了一家拥有多个VPC并在其本地数据中心与eu-west-2 Region之间建立直接连接的公司.公司和公司的VPC的CIDR块不重叠.该公司需要两个区域和数据中心之间的连接.该公司需要一种可扩展的解决方案，同时减少运营开销.解决方案架构师应该怎么做才能满足这些要求？

choices.A: Set up inter-Region VPC peering between the VPC m us-east-1 and the VPCs in eu-west-2->在us-east-1的VPC和eu-west-2的VPC之间建立区域间VPC对等
choices.B: Create private virtual interfaces from the Direct Connect connection in us-east-1 to the VPCs in eu-west-2->从us-east-1中的Direct Connect连接到eu-west-2中的VPC创建专用虚拟接口
choices.C: Establish VPN appliances in a fully meshed VPN network hosted by Amazon EC2 Use AWS VPN CloudHub to send and receive data between the data centers and each VPC->在Amazon EC2托管的全网状VPN网络中建立VPN设备使用AWS VPN CloudHub在数据中心和每个VPC之间发送和接收数据
choices.D: Connect the existing Direct Connect connection to a Direct Connect gateway Route traffic from the virtual private gateways of the VPCs in each Region to the Direct Connect gateway->将现有的Direct Connect连接连接到Direct Connect网关将流量从每个区域中的VPC的虚拟专用网关路由到Direct Connect网关

body: A user owns a MySQL database that is accessed by various clients who expect, at most, 100 ms latency on requests. Once a record is stored in the database, it is rarely changed. Clients only access one record al a time. Database access has been increasing exponentially due to increased client demand. The resultant load will soon exceed the capacity of the most expensive hardware available for purchase. The user wants to migrate to AWS, and is willing to change database systems. Which service would alleviate the database load issue and offer virtually unlimited scalability for the future?一个用户拥有一个MySQL数据库，该数据库可以由各种客户端访问，这些客户端最多期望对请求的延迟为100毫秒.记录一旦存储在数据库中，就很少更改.客户一次只能访问一个记录.由于客户需求的增加，数据库访问已成倍增加.由此产生的负载将很快超过可购买的最昂贵硬件的容量.用户想迁移到AWS，并愿意更改数据库系统.哪种服务可以减轻数据库负载问题，并为将来提供几乎无限的可扩展性？

choices.A: Amazon RDS
choices.B: Amazon DynamoDB
choices.C: Amazon Redshift
choices.D: AWS Data Pipeline->AWS数据管道

body: A company has several web servers that need to frequently access a common Amazon RDS MySQL Multi-AZ instance. The company wants a secure method for the web servers to connect to the database while meeting a security requirement to rotate user credentials frequently. A company has several web servers that need to frequently access a common Amazon ROS MySQL Muto-AZ DB instance. The company wants a secure method for the web servers to connect to the database while meeting a security requirement to rotate user credentials frequently. Which solution meets these requirements?一家公司有几台Web服务器，它们需要经常访问一个常见的Amazon RDS MySQL Multi-AZ实例.该公司希望Web服务器能够以一种安全的方法连接到数据库，同时满足安全要求，以便经常轮换用户凭据.一家公司有几台Web服务器，它们需要经常访问一个常见的Amazon ROS MySQL Muto-AZ数据库实例.该公司希望Web服务器能够以一种安全的方法连接到数据库，同时满足安全要求，以便经常轮换用户凭据.哪种解决方案满足这些要求？

choices.A: Store the database user credentials in AWS Secrets Manager. Grant the necessary IAM permissions to allow the web servers to access AWS Secrets Manager->将数据库用户凭证存储在AWS Secrets Manager中.授予必要的IAM权限以允许Web服务器访问AWS Secrets Manager
choices.B: Store the database user credentials m AWS Systems Manager OpsCenter. Grant the necessary IAM permissions to allow the web servers to access OpsCenter->在AWS Systems Manager OpsCenter中存储数据库用户凭证.授予必要的IAM权限，以允许Web服务器访问OpsCenter
choices.C: Store the database user credentials in a secure Amazon S3 bucket. Grant the necessary IAM permissions to allow the web servers to retrieve credentials and access the database->将数据库用户凭证存储在安全的Amazon S3存储桶中.授予必要的IAM权限，以允许Web服务器检索凭据并访问数据库
choices.D: Store the database user credentials in fries encrypted with AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) on the web server file system. The web server should be able to decrypt the files and access the database->将数据库用户凭证存储在通过Web服务器文件系统上的AWS Key Management Service（AWS KMS）加密的薯条中. Web服务器应该能够解密文件并访问数据库

body: A company has an asynchronous web application where Amazon API Gateway triggers AWS Lambda functions to perform write and update operations on an Amazon RDS DB instance. During periods of extreme use API Gateway and Lambda scale in response to the incoming workload but service outages occur due to congestion with Amazon RDS. The company is seeking a cost-effective design to alleviate this congestion. What should a solutions architect recommend'?一个公司有一个异步Web应用程序，其中Amazon API Gateway触发AWS Lambda函数以在Amazon RDS数据库实例上执行写入和更新操作.在极端使用期间，API Gateway和Lambda会根据传入的工作负载进行扩展，但是由于Amazon RDS的拥塞而导致服务中断.该公司正在寻求一种具有成本效益的设计来减轻这种拥堵.解决方案架构师应该建议什么？

choices.A: implement RDS storage autoscaling with a larger instance type->使用更大的实例类型实现RDS存储自动扩展
choices.B: Create read replicas to alleviate me read requests on the database->创建只读副本以减轻我对数据库的读取请求
choices.C: Use Amazon Kinesis to poll the incoming requests from API Gateway to the Lambda functions->使用Amazon Kinesis轮询从API网关到Lambda函数的传入请求
choices.D: Use Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) to buffer the incoming requests before delivering them to the Lambda functions->使用Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）缓冲传入的请求，然后再将它们传递给Lambda函数

body: A solutions architect is designing a highly available website that is served by multiple web servers hosted outside of AWS. If an instance becomes unresponsive, the architect needs to remove it from the rotation. What is the MOST efficient way to fulfill this requirement?解决方案架构师正在设计一个高可用性网站，该网站由AWS外部托管的多个Web服务器提供服务.如果实例无响应，则架构师需要将其从轮换中删除.满足此要求的最有效的方法是什么？

choices.A: Use Amazon CloudWatch to monitor utilization.->使用Amazon CloudWatch监控利用率.
choices.B: Use Amazon API Gateway to monitor availability.->使用Amazon API Gateway监视可用性.
choices.C: Use an Amazon Elastic Load Balancer.->使用Amazon Elastic Load Balancer.
choices.D: Use Amazon Route 53 health checks.->使用Amazon Route 53健康检查.

body: A company has thousands of edge devices that collectively generate 1 TB of status alerts each day Each alert is approximately 2 KB in size. A solutions architect needs to implement a solution to ingest and store the alerts for future analysis. The company wants a highly available solution However the company needs to minimize costs and does not want to manage additional infrastructure. Additionally, the company wants to keep 14 days of data available for immediate analysis and archive any data older than 14 days. What is the MOST operationally efficient solution that meets these requirements?一个公司有成千上万的边缘设备，每天总共产生1 TB状态警报.每个警报的大小约为2 KB.解决方案架构师需要实施一种解决方案，以提取和存储警报以供将来分析.该公司需要一个高度可用的解决方案，但是该公司需要将成本降至最低，并且不希望管理其他基础架构.此外，该公司希望保留14天的数据可用于立即分析，并存档任何14天之前的数据.满足这些要求的最有效的运营解决方案是什么？

choices.A: Create an Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream to ingest the alerts. Configure the Kinesis Data Firehose stream to deliver the alerts to an Amazon S3 bucket. Set up an S3 LifecycJe configuration to transition data to Amazon S3 Glacier after 14 days->创建一个Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose交付流以提取警报.配置Kinesis Data Firehose流，以将警报传递到Amazon S3存储桶.设置S3 LifecycJe配置以在14天后将数据过渡到Amazon S3 Glacier
choices.B: Launch Amazon EC2 instances across two Availability Zones and place them behind an Elastic Load Balancer to ingest the alerts. Create a script on the EC2 instances that will store the alerts in an Amazon S3 bucket. Set up an S3 Lifecycle configuration to transition data to Amazon S3 Glacier after 14 days->在两个可用区中启动Amazon EC2实例，并将它们放置在Elastic Load Balancer后面以接收警报.在EC2实例上创建一个脚本，该脚本会将警报存储在Amazon S3存储桶中.设置S3 Lifecycle配置以在14天后将数据过渡到Amazon S3 Glacier
choices.C: Create an Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream to ingest the alerts. Configure the Kinesis Data Firehose stream to deliver the alerts to an Amazon Elasticsearch Service (Amazon ES) cluster. Set up the Amazon ES cluster to take manual snapshots every day and delete data from the cluster that is older than 14 days->创建一个Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose交付流以提取警报.配置Kinesis Data Firehose流，以将警报传递到Amazon Elasticsearch Service（Amazon ES）集群.设置Amazon ES集群以每天进行手动快照，并从集群中删除早于14天的数据
choices.D: Create an Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) standard queue to ingest the alerts and set the message retention period to 14 days. Configure consumers to poll the SQS queue check the age of the message and analyze the message data as needed if the message is 14 days old, the consumer should copy the message to an Amazon S3 bucket and delete the message from the SQS queue->创建一个Amazon Simple Queue Service（Amazon SQS）标准队列以接收警报并将消息保留期设置为14天.配置使用者以轮询SQS队列以检查消息的期限并根据需要分析消息数据（如果消息已存在14天），使用者应将消息复制到Amazon S3存储桶并从SQS队列中删除消息

body: A company is using Amazon DynamoDB to stage its product catalog which is 1 GB. Since a product entry on average consists of100 KB of data, and the average traffic is about 250 requests per second, the database administrator has provisioned 3.000 RCUs of read capacity throughput. However, some products are very popular and users are experiencing delays or timeouts due to throttling. What improvement offers a long-term solution to this problem?一家公司正在使用Amazon DynamoDB登台其1 GB产品目录.由于产品条目平均包含100 KB数据，并且平均流量约为每秒250个请求，因此数据库管理员已配置了3.000个RCU的读取容量吞吐量.但是，某些产品非常受欢迎，并且用户由于节流而遇到延迟或超时.有什么改进可以为该问题提供长期解决方案？

choices.A: Increase the throughput provisioning to 6.000 read capacity units (RCUs)->将吞吐量配置增加到6.000个读取容量单位（RCU）
choices.B: Use Amazon DynamoDB Accelerator to maintain the frequently read items->使用Amazon DynamoDB Accelerator维护经常阅读的项目
choices.C: Augment Amazon DynamoDB by storing only the key product attributes, with the details stored on Amazon S3->通过仅存储关键产品属性来增强Amazon DynamoDB，并将详细信息存储在Amazon S3上
choices.D: Change the partition key to consist of a hash of product key and product type instead of just the product key->更改分区键以使其包含产品密钥和产品类型的哈希，而不仅仅是产品密钥

body: A company needs guaranteed Amazon EC2 capacity in three specific Availability Zones in a specific AWS Region for an upcoming event that will last 1 week. What should the company do to guarantee the EC2 capacity?公司需要在特定的AWS地区的三个特定的可用区中确保Amazon EC2的容量，以应对将持续1周的即将到来的事件.公司应怎么做才能保证EC2容量？

choices.A: Purchase Reserved Instances that specify the Region needed.->购买指定所需区域的预留实例.
choices.B: Create an On-Demand Capacity Reservation that specifies the Region needed.->创建一个按需容量预留来指定所需的区域.
choices.C: Purchase Reserved Instances that specify the Region and three Availability Zones needed.->购买指定实例和所需的三个可用区的预留实例.
choices.D: Create an On-Demand Capacity Reservation that specifies the Region and three Availability Zones needed.->创建一个按需容量预留，该预留指定了所需的区域和三个可用区.

body: A solutions architect is moving the static content from a public website hosted on Amazon EC2 instances to an Amazon S3 bucket. An Amazon CloudFront distribution will be used to deliver the static assets. The security group used by the EC2 instances restricts access to a limited set of IP ranges. Access to the static content should be similarly restricted. Which combination of steps will meet these requirements? (Select TWO.)解决方案架构师正在将静态内容从Amazon EC2实例上托管的公共网站移动到Amazon S3存储桶. Amazon CloudFront发行版将用于交付静态资产. EC2实例使用的安全组将访问限制为一组有限的IP范围.同样，对静态内容的访问也应受到限制.哪些步骤组合可以满足这些要求？ （选择两个.）

choices.A: Create an origin access identity (OAI) and associate it with the distribution. Change the permissions in the bucket policy so that only the OAI can read the objects.->创建一个原始访问身份（OAI）并将其与分发相关联.更改存储桶策略中的权限，以便仅OAI可以读取对象.
choices.B: Create an AWS WAF web ACL that includes the same IP restrictions that exist in the EC2 security group. Associate this new web ACL with the CloudFront distribution.->创建一个包含与EC2安全组中相同的IP限制的AWS WAF Web ACL.将此新的Web ACL与CloudFront分配相关联.
choices.C: Create a new security group that includes the same IP restrictions that exist in the current EC2 security group. Associate this new security group with the CloudFront distribution.->创建一个新的安全组，其中包括与当前EC2安全组中存在的IP限制相同的IP限制.将此新的安全组与CloudFront分配相关联.
choices.D: Create a new security group that includes the same IP restrictions that exist in the current EC2 security group. Associate this new security group with the S3 bucket hosting the static content.->创建一个新的安全组，其中包括与当前EC2安全组中存在的IP限制相同的IP限制.将此新安全组与托管静态内容的S3存储桶相关联.
choices.E: Create a new IAM role and associate the role with the distribution. Change the permissions either on the S3 bucket or on the files within the S3 bucket so that only the newly created IAM role has read and download permissions.->创建一个新的IAM角色，并将该角色与分发相关联.在S3存储桶或S3存储桶中的文件上更改权限，以便只有新创建的IAM角色才具有读取和下载权限.

body: A company wants to host its web application on AWS using multiple Amazon EC2 instances across different AWS Regions. Since the application content will be specific to each geographic region, the client requests need to be routed to the server that hosts the content for that clients Region.What should a solutions architect do to accomplish this? 一家公司希望使用跨不同AWS区域的多个Amazon EC2实例在AWS上托管其Web应用程序.由于应用程序内容将特定于每个地理区域，因此需要将客户端请求路由到托管该客户端区域内容的服务器.解决方案架构师应该怎么做才能做到这一点？

choices.A: Configure Amazon Route 53 with a latency routing policy.->使用延迟路由策略配置Amazon Route 53.
choices.B: Configure Amazon Route 53 with a weighted routing policy.->使用加权路由策略配置Amazon Route 53.
choices.C: Configure Amazon Route 53 with a geolocation routing policy.->使用地理位置路由策略配置Amazon Route 53.
choices.D: Configure Amazon Route 53 with a multivalue answer routing policy->使用多值答案路由策略配置Amazon Route 53

body: An application is scanning an Amazon Dynamodb table that was created with default settings. The application occasionally reads stale data when it queries the table.How can this issue be corrected?应用程序正在扫描使用默认设置创建的Amazon Dynamodb表.应用程序在查询表时偶尔会读取陈旧的数据.如何解决此问题？

choices.A: Increase the provisioned read capacity of the table->增加表的预配置读取容量
choices.B: Enable Auto Scaling on the Dynamodb table->在Dynamodb表上启用自动缩放
choices.C: Update the application to use strongly consistent reads->更新应用程序以使用高度一致的读取
choices.D: Re-create the Dynamodb table with eventual consistency disabled->重新创建Dynamodb表，并最终禁用一致性

ans_desc: Strongly consistent reads ensure that the latest written data is returned, while eventual consistency means that a read may return stale data  高度一致的读取操作确保返回最新的写入数据，而最终的一致性意味着读取操作可能返回过时的数据

body: A solutions architect is designing an API that will use Amazon API Gateway , which is backed by AWS Lambda. The Lambda function is not running inside a VPC and will query Amazon Dynamodb to get the results. The user will include the Itemid request parameter in the URL query string as the Key to retrieve the data. The solutions architect analyzed the trafficpattern and has noticed that customers are sending repeated queries to get the same information. The solutions architect wants to implement a caching mechanism to reduce the load onthe database and improve query latency.What should the solutions architect do to implement a caching solution ?解决方案架构师正在设计一个将使用由AWS Lambda支持的Amazon API Gateway的API. Lambda函数未在VPC内运行，并且将查询Amazon Dynamodb以获取结果.用户将在URL查询字符串中包含Itemid请求参数，作为检索数据的关键字.解决方案架构师分析了流量模式，并注意到客户正在重复发送查询以获取相同的信息.解决方案架构师希望实现一种缓存机制，以减少数据库的负载并提高查询延迟.解决方案架构师应该怎么做才能实现缓存解决方案？

choices.A: In Apl Gateway , add an additional Cache-Control:only-if-cached header before sending the request to Lambda->在Apl Gateway中，在将请求发送到Lambda之前，添加一个额外的Cache-Control:only-if-cached标头
choices.B: In API Gateway , enable caching based on the ItemId query parameter->在API Gateway中，根据ItemId查询参数启用缓存
choices.C: In Lambda , use /tmp as the cache directory to store previously retrieved requests->在Lambda中，使用/ tmp作为缓存目录来存储先前检索到的请求
choices.D: In Amazon Elasticache , store previously retrieved requests and query the cluster before querying the database->在Amazon Elasticache中，存储先前检索的请求并在查询数据库之前查询集群

body: A company's new web application running on Amazon EC2 across multiple Availability Zones ( AZs ) will be heavily accessed during regular business hours. After business hours usage will be minimal.What fleet-scaling approach should be used to size the EC2 fleet to handle the traffic demands ?公司在多个可用区（AZ）上在Amazon EC2上运行的新Web应用程序将在正常工作时间内大量访问.下班后的使用量将降至最低.应使用哪种车队规模缩放方法来确定EC2车队的规模以应对交通需求？

choices.A: Manual scaling across all AZs->手动缩放所有可用区
choices.B: Provisioning for peak traffic->调配高峰流量
choices.C: Scheduled scaling->预定缩放
choices.D: Programmatic termination of all instances in one AZ during off-peak hours->在非高峰时段以编程方式终止一个可用区中的所有实例

body: A solutions architect needs to design an Amazon RDS for MySQL solution whereby users must be authenticated using only SSL connections.How should the solutions architect design the solution ?解决方案架构师需要设计一个Amazon RDS for MySQL解决方案，从而必须仅使用SSL连接对用户进行身份验证.解决方案架构师应如何设计解决方案？

choices.A: Only allow SSL connections through a VPC security group->仅允许通过VPC安全组进行SSL连接
choices.B: Use GRANT and ALTER commands with the REQUIRE SSL option for the user->为用户使用GRANT和ALTER命令以及REQUIRE SSL选项
choices.C: Connect with a MYSQL client that references the publickey->与引用公钥的MYSQL客户端连接
choices.D: Ensure that the SSL parameters are set in the parameter group at launch->确保启动时在参数组中设置了SSL参数

body: A customer has an application that consists of two layers: an ingestion layer that does some initial processing , and a second layer that does additional processing , which is much more resource intensive. The first layer consists of EC2 On-Demand instances to ensure that all requests can be successfully received. The second layer for processing requires GPUS and uses Spot Instances.What service should the first layer use to deliver job batches to the second layer ?客户拥有一个应用程序，该应用程序由两层组成:一个进行一些初始处理的摄取层，以及一个进行额外处理的第二层，这需要更多的资源.第一层由EC2按需实例组成，以确保可以成功接收所有请求.处理的第二层需要GPUS并使用竞价型实例.第一层应使用什么服务来将作业批传递到第二层？

choices.A: AWS Batch->AWS批处理
choices.B: Amazon SQS
choices.C: Amazon SNS

body: Users submit requests to a service that takes several minutes to process. A solutions architect needs to ensure that these requests are processed at least once , and that the service has the ability to handle large increases in the number of requests.How should these requirements be met ?用户向服务提交请求需要花费数分钟的时间.解决方案架构师需要确保至少处理一次这些请求，并且该服务具有处理大量请求增加的能力.应如何满足这些要求？

choices.A: Put the requests into an Amazon SQS queue and configure Amazon EC2 instances to poll the queue->将请求放入Amazon SQS队列并配置Amazon EC2实例以轮询队列
choices.B: Publish the message to an Amazon SNS topic that an Amazon EC2 subscriber can receive and  process->将消息发布到Amazon EC2订阅者可以接收和处理的Amazon SNS主题
choices.C: Save the request to an Amazon Dynamodb table with a Dynamodb stream that triggers an Amazon EC2 Spot Instance->将请求保存到具有触发Amazon EC2竞价型实例的Dynamodb流的Amazon Dynamodb表中
choices.D: Use Amazon S3 to store the requests and configure an event notification to have Amazon EC2 instances process the new object->使用Amazon S3存储请求并配置事件通知以使Amazon EC2实例处理新对象
